title: Nice to come back to
review: Have just returned home from 9 lovely nights at the Amari. Love the renovations and pool areas which is a vast improvement from previously. Would like to especially thank Pear for your assistance in helping us upgrade to a Executive Club room. All our previous stays have been in club rooms and would highly recommend. Love the look of the Club lounge and makes it more spacious. Thank you to Apple and all the lovely ladies in the lounge area for there special treatment and you are all such a huge asset to the hotel. Many thanks to the breakfast, cleaning and pool staff for your very friendly interaction. We understand that the hotel is focusing on a more family environment and that is good as I feel Pattaya is becoming more known for this rather than the sleaze of many years ago. Makes it more interesting to visit every year. But I am going to refer to a comment from Vicvladb from a review on 3/11 also from Melbourne. Please do not forget about your repeat customers that have enjoyed coming back year on year. As a couple we have enjoyed the atmosphere, staff and location of this hotel. But on the weekends the kids area/main pool gets over run from ex-pat families etc coming down for the wkend. You get the kids jumping from there area into the big pool and you cannot move for inflatable toys and kids screaming. This is where you need to improve with an adults ONLY area. The front lawn is being highly un utilised to its full potential, I am not interested in a sitting space, look at what The Holiday Inn next door has. The new restaurant will be fantastic and I am sure that will work for the hotel. But you need an Adults only beach club(like they have in Bali and Fiji) with cabanas and pool. You will lose people like us - couples that stay for 9-10 days every year and enjoy there quiet spaces and not having to put noise canceling headphones on. This was your high season, but also very quiet. I would hate to think what it would be like during very busy periods. We would consider staying elsewhere on our next visit if tourism has picked up as we like to have that balance of kids space and adult areas. Thank you for a lovely break.…

title: Superb hotel ! Amazing staff & best location !
review: Dear Muppet64,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  I am delighted to hear that you find home in Amari Pattaya and have had a pleasant stay with us for 9 wonderful nights. It is very nice to hear that you’ve found satisfaction with our new enhancements to design and overall facilities. Moreover, thank you for your compliments in regards to services from my team especially with Pear, and Apple to assist you when needed at the Executive Club Lounge, as well as staff from breakfast, housekeeping and pool team. I will personally forward your comments to Pear and Apple, and all team members in regards. Following your comments in regards to longer stay and repeat guests, please be assured that some actions have been taken to balance the needs.  As we do genuinely embrace our guest feedback, we are in progress of arranging Kids Areas and Quiet Zone.  This will have a more personal service from the team and be aimed at valuable couples such as yourselves and of the future.  Do contact me for a future reservation and it will be my pleasure to look after you personally.   Again, I appreciate you sharing your experience. I look forward to your next visit in the future.   Kind regards,   Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Stayed with my family for 4 nights in 2 Grand Deluxe Ocean View & everyone enjoyed so much. Rooms are spacious & well equipped with amazing view. Bed & aircon are comfy. All staff we met are courteous, efficient & always with a smile. Breakfast layout is good and comfortable with choice of outdoor tables. Good selection of food & of high quality. We need to talk about the new pools with slides which brought us lots of fun. Even the staff standby at top of slide is friendly and interact with guests. This is our 3rd stay & improvement is beyond our expectations. Location is great ! There is a shortcut from car entrance of the adjacent Holiday Inn which is less than 10 mins walk to the new T21 Mall. Thank you for providing us a wonderful family vacation. Highly recommended.

title: Cok guzel
review: Dear YL T,  Warm greetings from Amari Pattaya.  I am pleased to hear that this was your third stay and you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Thank you for sharing your comments in regards to your comfortable stay with beautiful view at Grand Deluxe Ocean View. I am glad to hear that you found satisfaction in the services from my team, as well as enjoyable breakfast buffet. Moreover, I am thrilled to hear that you and your families had a great time at the pools and slides, as well as your convenience with our location. At Amari, special emphasis is placed on staff training, and we strive everyday to better the experiences for our guests.  I look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: NA
review: Room was very clean. It was quiet to sleep.(outside is quiet) You can go any site easily. It means location is also good.  There is good swimming pool for kids. All staff were kind. During stay I did not feel any uncomfortable.

title: One of our best hotel for our kids.
review: A lot of activities for kids to enjoy kids club, playground and fun kids swimming pool. Hotel staff is kindness make us feeling happy during stay. There will be sure for us to revisit again in the future.

title: Amari Ocean Pattaya
review: Dear racs2019,  Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful feedback.   I am delighted to hear that you and your kids had a memorable trip following your recent stay with us. I am pleased that your little ones were happily entertained at Treehouse Kids Club, playground, and kids’ swimming pool. Also, thank you for your compliments in regards to services from my team. At Amari, we strive to deliver services to your expectations, yet it is always nice to hear that our efforts are recognised.   Again, I appreciate you sharing your experience. I look forward to your next visit in the future.   Kind regards,   Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: amari, children freindly family hotel
review: Everything was good. But you can't rent a life jacket in the pool or blow in the tube. Breakfast was not great but not bad. The location of the hotel is very good. The staff at the front desk was very friendly and I recommend visiting if the children are young.

title: Amari. Very good hotel
review: Dear hughlee868,  I appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  It is nice to hear that you find overall experience a comfortable stay with us. I am delighted to hear that you find convenience in our location. Moreover, I am pleased to hear that you find pleasant services from my team. However, I apologise for the inconvenience which may have caused in which we do not offer a life vest for pool facilities. Please be assured that we have 4 Pool Team staff at every detectable spot to help support for safety concerns. As for breakfast buffet, I assure you that we are taking advances to improve at all times.   I appreciate you sharing and recommending us, especially for families with young children. I look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Great family hotel with great service
review: we stayed there for 4 days. very good staff. special mention for indian chef mr. reddy. he has taken special care of us. we are pure vegitarian and from our group there were strict jains also. idly, aloo paratha , upma, sambar etc were as good as best restaurant in india. hose keeping was average. broken glass in balcony they cleared after 3 days. restaurants have very bad pizza.

title: Good choice
review: stayed for 3 nights with friend.  booked a deluxe ocean view room, good view for the beach and garden of the hotel as well.  Room is comfort, neat and spacious.   Staff is nice and helpful.  Location of this hotel is excellent.  A lovely swimming pool that we spent every half day and enjoyed very much.  We are satisfied that we'll come back!

title: An excellent hotel in Pattaya
review: Dear Rita A,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience during your previous stay with us.  It is nice to hear that you and your children thoroughly enjoyed your vacation with us. I am glad to hear that the services from my team were pleasant and the facilities for the children. Also, I appreciate your kind compliments for the  Kids’ Cafe where they can enjoy food, activity, and interaction with the team.   I appreciate you sharing your experience with us, and I look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: good hotel
review: The view of Grand Deluxe Room is terrific, you can enjoy the beautiful scene of Pattaya beach and sunset in room. The location is so convenience, just take within 7 minutes walking distance from hotel to Terminal 21. You can find the 24 hours restaurant beside Foodland at Terminal 21.

title: Great stay!
review: Dear Meander66586066827,  Thank you for the time taken to share with me your comments following this recent stay with us.  I am pleased to hear that you’ve found all to be to your convenience and comfort, along with the location of our hotel. At Amari, we strive to exceed your expectations and it is always satisfying to receive positive feedback.  I look forward to welcoming you back should you return in the future to Pattaya.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Excellent stay
review: Quite a bit expensive But the hotel is good. Overall very satisfied.  The pool is beautiful and open until 11.00pm. Fitness is open 24hour. Large room. Breakfast variety. The hotel is near the sea, just walk across the road.

title: Experience at Amari Pattaya
review: The accommodation is very good for the family. But should add more variety to the breakfast. Due to many nationalities and religions. Overall very good Therefore would like to come back to stay here againใ

title: Business trip
review: Dear santip870,  Thank you for taking the time to send your review as it is always satisfying to receive feedback I am delighted to hear that you found our accommodation to your satisfaction, especially for your family. Please be assured that the varietyof breakfast buffet is rotated to satisfy guests, aiming to cover the various nationalities who stay with us.  I look forward to welcoming you back in the future  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Luxury at it's Best!
review: There are some improvement to be a five star hotel. But all over i was satisfied. Location is very good. Clean room and good breakfast. Some contruction work ongoing nearby but i think they wil be soon finished. There was som challenges under my stay. But they was handled in a good matter.

title: Not simply a hotel, more a beach resort!
review: Dear Passport61559894365  Warm greetings from Amari Pattaya.  I am very pleased to hear that you were having a pleasant time at your stay. Thank you for sharing your kind words in regards to our convenient location, your room, and breakfast buffet. However, I apologise for the inconvenience which may have caused in regards to areas where we have minor construction with our sister hotel, Ozo Pattaya, which is soon to be opened. Moreover, I am pleased to hear that my team was able to support and assist where you needed to handle. For this, I highly appreciate your kind remarks and areas where we definitely can improve. At Amari, special emphasis is placed on staff training, and we strive everyday to better the experiences of our guests.  Without a doubt, we strive to keep and improve our exceptional service. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Focus on families
review: Amari Pattaya, a part of Amari hotel chain and onyx hospitality group is situated just 2 hours by road from Bangkok by bus or private car. You can directly fly in to U-Tapao Rayong Pattaya International Airport which is on 45 mins driving distance from the hotel. You can pre-book your pickup and drop at the hotel reception or just inform them on email address. Amari Pattaya has there own private beach area which lies just opposite to the property and is just serene to get the best view at any time of the day. Below are some points I would love to highlight on the property-  Interiors- The place is aesthetically pleasing and has interiors which are subtle and classy. Love how the property maintains every section and have planned it so well. A contemporary showcase of traditional…

title: Family trip
review: I was so happy with my family trip. The hotel's swimming pool, service and hotel were in very good condition. I will visit this hotel again the next time I come to Pattaya. We hope that construction of hotel is finished and can go to Terminal 21 early.

title: Great time for Family @Amari
review: Dear leejjongs,  I appreciate your time to write your kind feedback. I am delighted to hear that you have had a wonderful stay with your family at Amari Pattaya. I am pleased to hear that you have enjoyed your time at the swimming pools, and found pleasantness in services and hotel facilities. Please be assured that our new restaurant, Beach Quarter, and sister hotel, Ozo Pattaya, is soon to be completed.   Thank you again for taking the time to share your positive experience with us following your recent stay. We look forward to welcoming you again in the future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Lovely place to stay
review: Good hotel for family. Our children like KIDSCHECKIN very much. There is a good welcome. Amazing pool for kids.  For Breakfast, there have kid zone for creating some foods. And variety of foods for all visitors.

title: Great holiday hotel
review: Dear pathitnutda,  Thank you for taking the time to share your pleasant experience during your previous stay with us.  It is very nice to hear that you and your little ones thoroughly enjoyed your vacation with us, especially at the kid’s check in counter. I am glad to hear that the services from my team were pleasant and I am thrilled to hear that the swimming pools brought you and your kids a lot of good times. Also, I appreciate your kind compliments with Kids’ Cafe where they can enjoy a little food activity which you are on your buffet plates. At Amari, we are continually aiming to improve and exceed guests’ expectations. Still, it is always satisfying to receive feedback like this.   Again, we appreciate you sharing your positive experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Nice view comfortable hotel
review: Very ideally located... good, nice and clean place to stay.....  Staff had been very generous and courteous.... Special mention of Mr. Knotty at the Reception and Mr. Banks at the Bell Desk. Took great care of my family and kids....  Neat and Tidy rooms.... Spacious and luxurious..... Amazing Swimming Pool with a mini water park....  Definitely worth to stay !!!

title: Great hotel...
review: Great hotel with great child activities. I have only two minor complaints with the hotel. First is the breakfast menu was repetitive and secondly the gym was very basic. Staffs were great and always helpful, big thumbs up for them. A must consideration if travelling with family, as the room size was good and is very near to the beach. Thank you for the lovely stay.

title: Happy Holiday at Amari Suites Pattaya
review: Dear Vishal K,  Warm greetings from Amari Pattaya.  Thank you for choosing us to accommodate you during your previous stay. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, especially with kids’ facilities. I am sorry to hear of the slight bump during breakfast experience and gym facilities, for that, I will consider and look into ideas for exciting tastes and other possible enhancements with my team. However on a lighter note, thank you for your kind compliments in regards to services from all staff members, as well as your positive recommendation.  At Amari, special emphasis is placed on staff training, and it is our priority to achieve highest for our guest’s satisfaction.  Again, I appreciate you taking the time to send your feedback. I look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Awesome Stay as Always
review: Fabulous holiday in Pattaya. Enjoy swimming pool with slider. We stay in 2-bedroom suites which is super convenient. Enjoy breakfast so much with variety of choices. We strongly recommend this hotel to other families.

title: Great service
review: Dear Journey94223,  I appreciate you taking the time to send your wonderful feedback.  First and foremost, I am delighted to hear that you’ve enjoyed the comfort and exclusive convenience in your previous stay with us at Amari Suites. I am pleased to hear that the swimming pools with slides, amenities in your room, and varieties of food from our breakfast were to your satisfaction. Moreover, thank you for your positive recommendation.  Again, I appreciate you sharing your wonderful experience with us. I look forward to welcoming you again should your travels bring you to Pattaya.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Amari Pattaya
review: This was my second time staying at the Amari Pattaya City hotel on Beach Road. The Staff are extremely friendly and welcoming, and always super helpful. Check in took a bit longer than normal due to room not being ready yet, but the reception staff woireked hard to get us comfy as soon as possible. Overall the hotel is clean and a pleasure to stay at. Breafast Buffet caters for all tastes, and you definitely won't go hungry there. the Wifi at the Hotel is great, I could easilyw ork from the hotel using the wifi whenever required, and general social media browsing was seamless too. Overall I totally enjoyed my stay once again at the Amari.

title: Nice hotel
review: The staff are smiling, serve good service. I fell them kindly welcome the guests. In room, they have a "sweet dream" sign and cookies everyday. The breakfast in Amaya has a variety of food and look clean.

title: Lovely room, lovely staff and great location
review: Dear sarinratsangwisa2018,  I am delighted to hear that you have had a pleasant stay at Amari Pattaya. I am pleased to hear that find satisfaction with the services from our staff members, enjoyed our turn down and our little note, as well as the varieties from breakfast buffet. At Amari, we strive to deliver exceptional service. It is always an encouraging boost for our team to receive feedback like this.  Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful experience with us. We look forward to your next visit in the near future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: One of the best family hotels in Pattaya
review: Stayed in a Grand Deluxe Pool View on the 15th floor so we could see the sea as well. The room itself was lovely - comfy bed and comfy daybed. It was a good sleep!  Concierge and front desk staff were also nice. We are not that of a regular travellers to this hotel but they still remember us. A plus for that.   Also, we would love to go for Grande Deluxe Ocean View or Executive rooms in the future for that stunning view and access to the famous Executive Lounge for Executive room type!

title: Newly renovated hotel on North Pattaya
review: Dear 890sunnyday888,  I appreciate your time in sharing your positive feedback with us. It was a pleasure to learn of your satisfaction in regards the view from your Grand Deluxe Ocean View along with comfortable beds. I am delighted to hear that this was not your first visit and that our team was able to pleasantly surprise you. I would definitely recommend you to experience the Executive Club Rooms, I am sure you would enjoy the exclusive benefits at Executive Club Lounge. Whilst we strive every day to deliver exceptional service, it is always nice to receive feedback like this where our efforts are recognised.  Thank you again for sharing your pleasant experience. I look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Very nice new suite rooms for family
review: Highlights are swimming pool with waterpark sliders, kids club, stunning view, great location, great variety and good taste of breakfast and great services from lovely hotel staffs. Check-in counter for kids. Our kids love this hotel.

title: Great place for a family trip
review: Rooms and facilities are still new.   Very comfy pillow though the bed was a bit on the soft side. Love the big sofa bed in the room, spacious for a chubby kid with 130cm height and weigh 60kg. Pool area is great though very crowded. Pool guards were everywhere to ensure the safety of the kids. My nephew loved the big slider so much.   Breakfast area got crowded around 8am ( we were there during long weekend). Those that came down late have to wait in queue for a while. So, either be there early or very late to avoid the traffic.  Spa was the thing I love most about this place. I enjoyed the head massage so much and my nephew loved his oil massage for a kid.  Recommend for a family trip but totally not the place for a couple or those looking for a place to enjoy tranquility.

title: Great swimming pool for kids but poor service and solution
review: Dear piscespair,   I appreciate your time in sharing your positive experience with us. It was a pleasure to learn of your satisfaction in regards to the comfort you found in your room, the pool facilities, the safety and services  from our Pool Team, and especially the massage from Breeze Spa. I am delighted to hear that you and your nephew’s time at the pool and Breeze Spa were one of your highlights. Though, I apologise for your inconvenience in terms of the traffic at the pool and breakfast buffet as it is during the long weekend. Still, I highly appreciate your patience and understanding during the encounters.   Whilst we strive every day to deliver exceptional service, it is always nice to receive feedback like this as it will be areas for our improvement to move forth. Thank you again for sharing your experience. I look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Amazing stay
review: My kids really like the swimming pool.  It looks safe and clean.  However, the room service had slow response. Some floors have not been renovated yet.  I've got the room on the floor which was renovated but the next floor is under renovation so the smell of paint thinner comes to my room.  After informing reception, it took quite long time to find and move into the new room.  So it's quite harmful especially to kids.  The new room I've got has not been renovated yet so it' quite old and the bunk bed is not safe.  There is no safety rail.  The bath hanger is broken and can't hold the shower.  The Front desk staff and concierge are friendly and helpful but the team member at Amaya (breakfast) are not.

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear swirac,  We appreciate you taking the time to send your feedback.  I would like to offer you my most sincere apologies for not meeting your expectations during your previous stay. Please be assured that your comments had been addressed to our team as to inform and communicate upon your arrival of the undergoing enhancements. Moreover, I have addressed my staff from Amaya Food Gallery in regards to the services which were to be improved.  Though, I’m pleased to hear that your kids have enjoyed the new swimming pools, and thank you for your kind words in regards to my Front staff and concierge of their services. Our focus is clear that we not only want to meet the expectations of each and every guest, but also strive to exceed them.   Without a doubt, we strive to maintain and improve our service. For this, we thank you for providing us with your comments. I hope you would consider staying with us again should your travels bring you to Pattaya.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Some good, some bad.
review: I was there for business trip in May 2019 and the room I got checked in was amazing. The room is huge and modern; toilet, shower and bath are all separated. Guess what, there are two washing basins in the bathroom, this is the best arrangement ever, you just don't need to line up to use the basin area in the morning. Closet space is more than enough and the bed is super comfy and big. Staffs there were extremely helpful and courteous. The breakfast is in buffet style and it serves wide range of food selection. I didn't have time to enjoy the pool but from my colleague's room looking down, it was very nice. My kids should love it a lot. Love to come again with my friends and family when we have plan visiting Pattaya. Thank you everyone in Amari Pattaya whom have together made us…

title: Family room
review: Good for family with kids, clean, best location as situated in front of beach and just 10mins walk to Terminal 21. Pool and kids club are very clean and in good condition.  Should improve breakfast with more variety and quality.

title: Amari Pattaya
review: Dear hoaw3241,  We appreciate you taking the time to send your wonderful feedback.  First and foremost, I am delighted to hear that you’ve enjoyed your previous stay with us, especially in regards to how our hotel is very friendly to kids and families. Moreover, thank you for your kind compliments in terms of cleanliness, convenient location, pool facilities, and Treehouse kids club. It is always nice to hear that you and your family had a pleasant time us. However, I am sorry to hear that our breakfast buffet did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that based upon our guest feedback, we continually aim to improve the breakfast buffet to do best to meet each and every guest’s satisfaction.   Again, thank you for your positive review. We look forward to welcoming you again should your travels bring you to Pattaya.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Hotel with a wide and good garden
review: All Staffs start from Bellboy, Front Desk, Guest Service, Security provide warm welcome with great hospitality. Very impressive. Will recommend Amari Pattaya to my friends.  Buffet Breakfast need some improvement.

title: BEST IN PATTAYA ( ALL ACTIVITES FREE FOR KIDS )
review: Dear jimmyneoning,  Thank you for taking the time to send your kind rating and feedback.  It is very nice to hear that you find our staff services throughout your experience with us pleasant and to your satisfaction. Please be assured that based upon our guest feedback, we continually aim to improve the breakfast buffet to do best to meet each and every guest’s satisfaction. Though, I am delighted and humbled to hear that you will recommend us to your circles.   Again, we appreciate you sharing your positive experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you should your travels bring you back to Pattaya.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Excellent weekend away from Bangkok
review: The renovation seems to me a little bit luck of empasis for elderly guests but for familes with kids. The hotel used to be one of the nicest in Pattaya, but it is regrett that its now not so highly acceptable to elderly people like us.

title: Great family vacation
review: Stayed for 5 days, it was great!!!  Hotel team is polite, helpful and super kind, giving us personal attention and making sure we enjoy our stay.  Breakfast is excellent  with variety of choice.  Pool is just perfect, with  slides and mini water park. We and our kids (8,5,1) loved it Sleeping quality is amazing  and room was spacious and clean  Thanks Amar Pattaya!!

title: Excellent trip
review: Dear guy_rg,  We appreciate you taking the time to send your wonderful feedback.  First and foremost, I am delighted to hear that you find pleasant experience in regards to our services from our staff members. Moreover, it is always nice to hear that you’ve enjoyed our breakfast buffet with various selections, pool facilities with water parks suitable for kids, as well as the room amenities and facilities. Thank you for your kind compliments. Our focus is clear that we not only want to meet the expectations of each and every guest, but also strive to exceed them, which is it always refreshing to know that our efforts are recognised.   Again, thank you for your positive review. We look forward to welcoming you again should your travels bring you to Pattaya.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: A very good decision ...
review: Lovely welcome by the concierge and reception staff.  We enjoyed a very relaxing stay being so well looked after by the Amari team.  The hotel is in a great location a few minutes walk from the beach. Our room with great views over the bay was very well looked after by our maid.  Thanks to the Executive Lounge staff who are fabulous including the amazing chef who made wonderful surprises every evening.  Many thanks to the 'A' team - Khun Na, Khun Thanida, Khun Am, Khun Muay, Khun Lylar, Khun Nicha, Khun May and Khun Mint who all work extremely hard and support each other. Well organised pool team and great pool for swimming.  Special thanks to the Amari hosts - Pear and App and the new addition Jane.  Lots of luck to Khun Deborah for a busy season ahead.

title: Best Option in Pattaya
review: Dear Jan B,  I am glad to hear that you’ve had a delightful experience during your previous stay. Thank you for your kind compliments in regards to our services from all our staff members, I will make sure our team know of your positive words as it will definitely be a good boost of encouragement. I am pleased to hear that your experience in the Executive Club Lounge, as well as evening plates were to your satisfaction. On my behalf, we appreciate your positive encouragement to the team.  Should your travels bring you to Pattaya, it would be our pleasure to welcome you again.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: PERFECT STAY
review: ... was made for me as one local contact booked this hotel for me. Everything was fine. The room, the personnel all around so nice and friendly. Everything ok, enjoyable and satisfying. Hopefully it will be available for my next stay.

title: Great resort
review: From the moment we arrived everything was great. The staff were excellent and the facilities/room were all top notch. Great places to walk to and with the beach right next door. Would highly recommend to anyone.

title: Holiday
review: Dear Philip M,  I am delighted to hear that you’ve had a pleasant holiday during your previous stay with us at Amari Pattaya. I am pleased to hear that you’ve found satisfaction with our services from all our team members. Also, it is nice to know that you’ve found our facilities, room, and location to your liking. Thank you for your kind compliments and your recommendation to stay at our hotel.   Again, we appreciate you for sharing your wonderful experience with us. We look forward to your next visit in the near future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Excellent hotel for family with children!
review: We have had a ball  This hotel is in a great spot away From the hustle and bustle but not to far  The staff in this hotel are amazing nothing is to much trouble  Breakfast is great there is enough choice for everyone ( spicy sausage is great )  We had to seek medical attention and we were so worried about getting things lost in translation but a young man at the concierge desk put in a taxi to the local hospital which was an international one I cannot thank him enough they were great.  Every one has greeted us with smiles another young man spoke to us at length about the football results , the security guys who saluted us every time we walked out, the ladies at breakfast the young lady by the towels to many to mention  This truly is a great hotel but if you are going in the next…

title: Great Resort, Great Pool, Great Location
review: Dear Anita883,  Thank you for taking the time to share your pleasant experience during your previous stay with us.  It is very nice to hear that you’ve enjoyed your vacation, especially in regards to the breakfast buffet. Despite the misfortunates of your need for medical attention, I am delighted to know that our team members were able to satisfy you with our services and able to assist you during urgent matter like this. At Amari, we are continually aiming to improve and exceed guests’ expectations. It is always satisfying to receive feedback like this.   Again, we appreciate you sharing your positive experience with us. We’re delighted to hear that you will choose Amari as for your next travel to Pattaya. We look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: First Time here..many times Pattaya
review: I love the pool area and the slider water, the service mind of this hotel staff. The suite building is perfectly for family with children.  Valuable every Baht I spent. I would love to come back to stay here again soon.

title: Family
review: Excellent place for family.Friendly staff ,excellent location right at the beach, enjoyed the stay ocean view and also close to other attractions.  Would definitely recommend this for family with cool pool for kids

title: Executive King at Amari Pattaya
review: Dear cjaisonjose,  I am delighted to hear that you and your family have had a good holiday during your previous stay with us at Amari Pattaya. We are pleased to hear that you’ve found our services to your satisfaction, location to your convenience, and swimming pools to your kids’ enjoyment. Thank you for your kind compliments and recommendation to stay at our hotel. At Amari, we strive to deliver exceptional service, and it is always satisfying to receive feedback like this.  Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with us. We look forward to your next visit in the near future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Nice
review: Nice and new hotel. Recommended. Services at executive lounge is more than good, cocktail with different options are one of the best among other hotels executive lounge. Just missing the fridge with soft drinks available at the lounge bar for guests consumption themselves or after service hour.

title: Food quality
review: Dear ShirleyL2252,  Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience with us. I am delighted to hear that you have had a pleasant experience at the Executive Club Lounge. I will take note of your comments about the soft drink services availability. Still, it is always gratifying for the team to receive feedback like this. We highly appreciate you spending your time to give us feedback as your comments are greatly appreciated as we strive to exceed your expectations at every opportunity.  We look forward to welcoming you back, should your travels bring you back to Pattaya.   Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Amazing
review: Altogether it was a positive experience. Our room was nice and clean. Big and comfortable bed. The bathroom area was HUGE and included bath tub and shower cubicle. Breakfast was excellent with ample variety. The swimming pool area is nice and well looked after. There were a couple of hiccups - related to room service and internet - however altogether they didn’t spoil our stay.

title: Amazing stay with kids
review: Great stay with my boys (7 & 3 years) . They enjoyed the pool alot its huge with water slides and great food at the poll bar. The staff are amazing very kind and helpful.  I recommend this hotel to families with kids who love to swim .

title: Swimming pool , Executive lounge
review: Dear inshi,  Thank you for taking the time to send your feedback.  I am delighted to hear that you find our services, pool facilities, food at Aqua Eatery & Bar, and services from all our staff to you and your family’s comfort. I am pleased to know that your children thoroughly enjoyed their time with us. I will humbly forward your feedback to our team members, as it is always satisfying to know that our efforts are recognised.   Again, we appreciate you sharing your positive experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you should your travels bring you back to Pattaya.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Best family stay in Pattaya
review: ที่ตั้งของโรงแรมอยู่บริเวณพัทยาเหนือ ถนนเลียบหาด ใกล้กับวงเวียนปลาโลมา สามารถเดินไปห้าง Terminal Pattaya ได้ โรงแรมเพิ่งทำการ Renovate ใหม่ ทั้งตัวห้องพัก และ บริเวณของโรงแรม สระว่ายน้ำใหม่มีขนาดใหญ่ เหมือนสวนน้ำขนาดย่อยๆ เด็กๆน่าจะชอบมากๆ เหตุผลที่เลือก Amari ส่วนหนึ่งเพราะเป็นสมาชิก Onyx ระดับ Platinum ทำให้ได้ Benefits ที่ค่อนข้างๆคุ้มค่าถ้าพักที่นี่ บริเวณล็อบบี้สูงโปร่ง โล่ง ทำให้รู้สึกสบายตา การตกแต่งคล้ายๆนั่งอยู่ริมชายทะเล ขณะเช็คอินมีพนักงานประจำ Counter เพียงแค่ 2 ท่าน ยื่นบัตร ปชช.และบัตร member พนักงานรับไปและส่งกันไปมา ทำให้ค่อนข้างเสียเวลา ผมได้ถามพนักงานถึงการเข้าใช้ Lounge ซึ่งเป็น Benefits สำหรับ Platinum ผมไม่ได้ซื้อรวมอาหารเช้ามา เพราะยังไงก็สามารถใช้สิทธิกินใน lounge ได้อยู่แล้ว แต่ถึงกระนั้นผมก็ถาม…

title: Good hotel
review: เรียน Geronimobooki  ขอขอบคุณที่ร่วมสละเวลาของท่านเขียนแสดงความคิดเห็นจากการเข้าพักครั้งที่ผ่านมา   ทางเรามีความยินดีเป็นอย่างยิ่งที่ได้ทราบว่า ท่านมีความประทับใจต่อการเข้าพักในครั้งนี้ โดยเฉพาะในส่วนของการบริการแบบเอ็กซ์คลูซีฟที่เอ็กเซ็กคิวทีฟคลับเลาน์จ ไม่ว่าจะเป็นการต้อนรับบริการ ขนมพักระหว่างวัน ไลนอาหารเช้าที่มีพร้อม และ happy hours ที่สามารถเต็มที่ได้ในช่วง 17:30-19:30 น.  ทั้งนี้ ดิฉันต้องขออภัยในความไม่สะดวกของท่านในส่วนของการเช็คอินเข้าห้องพัก ในส่วนนี้ เพื่อเป็นการยืนยันให้แน่ชัดถึงการบริการให้กับสมาชิกที่ถือบัตร ออนิกซ์ รีวอร์ด แพลตตินั่ม พนักงานเราจึงอาจใช้เวลาในการดำเนินการ ดิฉันต้องขออภัย ณ ที่นี้ และเหตุการณ์นี้ได้มีการดำเนินการต่อไปถึงหัวหน้าแผนกเพื่อเป็นการปรับปรุงแก้ไขการบริการเป็นที่เรียบร้อยค่ะ ขอขอบคุณท่านที่ช่วยชี้แนะในจุดที่เห็นว่าเราจะสามารถปรับปรุงและบริการได้ดียิ่งขึ้นไป  ดิฉันขอขอบคุณสำหรับคำติชมของท่านอีกครั้ง ในนามของโรงแรม อมารี พัทยา เราพร้อมต้อนรับและบริการในการมาเยี่ยมของท่านอีกครั้งเสมอ  สุกัญภัช หอมชื่น  ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการใหญ่

title: I highly recommend it.
review: The overall facilites are good after renovation. Staff are courtesy and polite. The pools are excellent and waterplays are fit for my kids. Breakfast are in good quality with various choices. I will recommend my friend to stay here.

title: A comfortable stay
review: I stayed here with my 4 friends for 2 nights.  Service : 3.5 / 5  Amari is a know brand in thailand. It was little busy, still we could get average service. Check in was slow but room service as well as restau service was good.  Breakfast : 4 / 5  Their spread during breakfast was splendid. Presentation as well as taste was too good to resist. All together we were very much satisfied by spread they served.  Room : 4 / 5  We booked 2 rooms which had an awesome pool / sea view from its french windows. It also has a small balcony. Room as well as bathroom were spacious with separate tub. Its " Breeze " brand toiletries was too good. In house complimentary " TWG "  tea was cherry on the cake. Room service menu was very limited.  Staff : 3.5 / 5  Amari is a busy property. Staffs were…

title: Brilliant hotel
review: Dear MaqsudDevdiwala,  Warm greetings from Amari Pattaya.  I am very pleased to hear that you were having a memorable time during your previous stay! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your pleasant experience and review for the following points; service, breakfast, room, staff, and an overall. It is always refreshing to feedback like this, especially when we can know the exact points where we could improve. In terms of our services and staff team, thank you for your kind compliments and understanding for occurrences which may appear during the peak hours. However, please be assured that we have taken advances into enhancing the efficiency of our team to better provide your service. At Amari, special emphasis is placed on staff training, and it is always rewarding when guests voice their appreciation.  Without a doubt, we strive to keep and improve our exceptional service. We are delighted to hear that you will be back to stay with us! We look forward to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Pennapa S.
review: First time i stayed at amari hotel chain with a group of friends visiting to play 4 rounds of golf. Usually prefer to stay at bigger chains but this time decided to stay at amari as the deal was quite good. What a revelation it was, clean, modern and wonderful location. rooms were well done up and modern, customer service was absolutely flawless couldn't find fault with anything. Buffet breakfast had more varieties than one can imagine and fantastically cooked. Definite a revisit hotel.

title: Nice location
review: Dear travel_golf71,  Thank you for taking the time to send your kind rating and feedback.  I am thrilled to hear that this is the first time that you choose us, and it won’t be the last! It is our pleasure to service you and I am delighted to hear that the room, facilities, and breakfast were to up to your satisfaction, the location was to your convenience, as well as our team was able to service and create this experience your memorable stay.   Again, we appreciate you sharing your pleasant experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you should your travels bring you back to Pattaya.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Good for family
review: Perfect Trip for my family ,only 1 night but we favor Amari ,Next trip we will here again  the best swimming pool , clean , good lifeguard , room is very big and bathroom can use easily , fittnes 24 h ok

title: Family friendly place
review: Great place to stay with the family.  The pool area was great and the whole family had a nice time together. Kids area was superb and children loved alot . Rooms were clean and big. Breakfast was great with a vast menu option

title: excellent experience
review: Dear haroonzaman,   Thank you for taking the time to send your kind rating and feedback.  It is very nice to hear that you and your family have had a wonderful time with us. I am delighted to hear that you find our new design to the rooms to your liking, as well as the services and facilities such as the water parks, Treehouse Kids Club, and our breakfast buffet. At Amari, we strive to deliver exceptional services, and it is always satisfying to know that our efforts are recognised.  Again, we appreciate you sharing your positive experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you should your travels bring you back to Pattaya.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Greater than my expectations !
review: Amari Suite is convenient for my family, ห้องพักเป็นสัดส่วนดี, ประตูห้องน้ำไม่มีที่ล็อคต้องระวัง, ห้องนอนมีพื้นที่ปูไม่เรียบเป็นคลื่นและแอร์เดี๋ยวร้อนเดี๋ยวเย็นไม่สม่ำเสมอ, อ่างล้างมือในห้องน้ำไม่แข็งแรง โดยรวมชอบฝั่งตึกมากกว่า ส่วนอื่น ๆ สระว่ายน้ำ ห้องคิดส์คลับ ห้องอาหารเช้า ดีอยู่แล้วค่ะ ไปช่วงวันหยุดต่อเนื่องคนเยอะไปหน่อยแต่พนักงานก็แก้ปัญหาได้ดี thank you for your all of staffs for service minds.

title: Pattaya Amari Biz stay
review: เรียน Departure42321214639  ในนามอมารี พัทยา เราขอขอบคุณที่ร่วมสละเวลามาเพื่อส่งคำติชมดีๆแบบนี้ค่ะ   ดิฉันรู้สึกยินดีที่ได้ทราบว่าคุณเป็นแขกที่เคยร่วมพักกับเรามาก่อนนี้ ดิฉันขออภัยในความไม่สะดวกในส่วนของประสบการณ์ที่คุณได้พบเจอในการเข้าพักครั้งที่ผ่านมาที่อมารี สวีท ในเรื่องของประตูที่ไม่มีที่ล็อค พื้นไม้ และระบบแอร์ที่ตั้งค่าแบบออโต้เซ็นต์เซอร์นี้ เราได้ทำการดำเนินเรื่องในเบื้องต้นเป็นที่เรียบร้อย ทั้งนี้ดิฉันขอขอบคุณ ณ ที่นี้ในความเข้าใจ และความประทับใจที่มีต่อเราในส่วนอื่นๆ ไม่ว่าจะเป็นในส่วนของดีไซน์ใหม่ที่อมารี ทาวเวอร์ สระว่ายน้ำใหม่ ทรีเฮ้าส์ คิดส์คลับ อาหารเช้า และการบริการจากพนักงานของเราทุกคน   ขอขอบคุณสำหรับคำติชมของคุณอีกครั้ง เราจะนำคำติชมเหล่านี้ไปพัฒนาเพื่อให้การบริการของเราและประสบการณ์การเข้าพักของแขกทุกท่านดียิ่งขึ้นไป ทางเราพร้อมต้อนรับและบริการการเข้าพักของคุณเสมอค่ะ  สุกัญภัช หอมชื่น  ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการใหญ่

title: Comfortable stay
review: My family had a great fun together all activities in hotel especially pool. Buffet had many kind of nation foods. Recommend for families have kids. Very fast early check in and nice staff all departments in hotel.

title: Executive Club Amari
review: I have stayed here many times the last one 6 years ago.Highly recommended.Great service ,location and reasonably priced.I have found the executive club on floors  18,19 & 20 to be of a high standard with great views.The girls are very helpful and polite.free wi fi with snacks available during the day

title: Great value hotel
review: Dear Alex G,  Thank you for taking the time to send your kind rating and feedback.  I am pleased to hear that you also chose to stay with us along with previous stays. It is nice to know that you’ve had a pleasant experience in terms of our services, location, value, as well as the view, design, and exclusive benefits of the Executive Club rooms and floors. It is always satisfying to receive feedback like this.  Again, we appreciate you sharing your positive experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you should your travels bring you back to Pattaya.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: 12 hr+ without power when temperature is 35 degrees!!!
review: Pool is new and good for baby and children. Hotel just renovated, it is value to money we spend and exchange. Just breakfast and morning restaurant that needed to improve. It’s small especially when many guests come during long holiday!

title: Five Star Beachfront Paradise!
review: Dear iamkann,  We are very grateful to hear that you have enjoyed your stay at the new look to Amari Pattaya. Thank you for your kind compliments in regards to our hotel facilities, and the value for money. I will make sure our team members know of your kind compliments as we strive to exceed your expectations at every opportunity. In terms of our breakfast and the queue, I apologise for your inconvenience which may have caused during our peak hours, although we have taken initiatives to create a higher guest experience during these periods and we continue to improve.  We appreciate you sharing your experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Highly recommend this hotel
review: Am here with my family for a holiday and we’ve booked here for 5 nights! Second day goes by without power for more than 12 hrs, Hotel has no courtesy even to find out how we spent the day!! Totally business focus!!

title: Fantastic experience at Amari Pattaya
review: Friendly staffs, especially security guards and GSO. Good quality of food and they have a great swimming pool (they have 3 slides in adults’ pool and 2 slides in kids pool) which make my family have a unforgettable experience.

title: Great place to stay and very friendly service.
review: Dear mifatongtam,   Thank you for taking the time to send your kind rating and feedback.  It is very nice to hear that you find our staff services, accommodations, and the in-room dining to your liking.  Based upon our guest feedback we are continually aiming to improve, and shall monitor the continued feedback on the selection of TV channels to then understand the selection required.  This is an ongoing focus for us.  Again, we appreciate you sharing your positive experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you should your travels bring you back to Pattaya.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: love it!
review: This is my 3rd time staying here but the 1st time after the renovation. The service is as great as it has been since my 1st time here. The room is spacious comparing with others in the same area and price. The location is very convenience.   The breakfast buffet is good with variety of food and beverage.  The newly renovated swimming pool is great! The staff at the pool and kids club is also great. My kids love it very much.  Just one star reduction for staying in the room next to the elevator as you can hear the sound of the elevators’ cable all night. Besides, the air-con in my room is not working and have to wait the technician to fix it.

title: amari pattaya
review: Dear yongcharoenfarm c,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience during your previous stay with us for the first time at the newly refreshed designs and facilities. I appreciate your compliments and I am pleased to learn that you have stayed with us before a few times. I am delighted to hear that our overall services and the new facilities were able to satisfy you and create a positive experience. However, I apologise for the inconvenience which may have caused in regards to the room being located near to the elevator as well as the air conditioning system technical difficulties. Though, your comments had been passed to respective Head of associated departments about the matter.   Again, we highly value your feedback. It is obvious that our goal is to satisfy and create a most possible memorable experience for our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back with us again soon.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Mr. Paresh
review: everything were perfect, we also offered our room upgraded by hotel staff (without our request), which is in the top executive floor (20 th floor). all tje staffs were very nice and friendly. nothing more to say!

title: Amari Ocean Pattaya
review: The best location. Clean staff excellent.  Food very high standard. Highly recommend for comfort and safety. Many Restaurants in the vicinity. On the Beach. Very pleasant to walk. Public transport available on Beach road.

title: 10 star
review: Dear Maria D,  I am delighted to hear that you have had a good holiday during your previous stay with us at Amari Pattaya. We are pleased to hear that you’ve enjoyed our facilities, restaurant menus, and the conveniences of the surroundings from our hotel. At Amari, we strive to deliver exceptional service, and it is always satisfying to receive feedback like this.  Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with us. We look forward to your next visit in the near future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Relax!
review: Amari Pattaya is the best place for family vacation we like the place.,staffs every thing perfect we like the place very much and thank you for the best service specially the kids club staffs thank you

title: It was Good stay
review: Dear kidumete,  Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful experience during your stay at Amari Pattaya. I am pleased to hear that you found our facilities satisfying and enjoyable. As well as I am glad to hear of the positive comments on our staff members. It is always gratifying for the whole team to receive feedback like this. Whilst we strive every day to deliver exceptional service, it is always nice to know when our efforts are recognised.   Again, we appreciate you sharing your experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you again, should you travels bring you back to Pattaya.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: An Oasis in Thailand
review: the property is right on the beach with a beautiful scenic view! also, their hospitality and warmth stands out. their swimming pool is one of a kind. the breakfast buffet is elaborate with predominant non vegetarian delicacies. the rooms are spacious and comfortable.

title: Good hotel
review: Make sure building work is completed before you book. So loud in the morning. New pool area is lovely. Trying to make it very kid friendly with new kids pool and play area. Rooms could have been cleaner.

title: Nice hotel at Pattaya
review: Dear Passport38379309422,  Thank you for sharing your valuable feedback with us, and be assured that we shall cascade and review accordingly with the team.  Construction of OZO Hotel is coming to external completition, which is on the site next to the hotel.  This will ensure limited disturbance to guests, and it is apologized that you were disturbed during your stay.  Concerning your room cleanliness, this has been addressed to the Executive Housekeeper and kindly accept her apology for the shortflall which you experienced.  Without a doubt, we strive to maintain and improve our service. Again, we thank you for providing us with your comments. We look forward to welcoming you again in the future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Very good services and hospitally
review: Nice hotel, nice staff, nice food, nice water park. Room is comfortable such as the light control by motion sensor. TV can directly connect to my mobile. Wifi is strong and cover all area. Water park is very fun.

title: Beautiful and memorable stay
review: Dear Chaiyongj,  We are very grateful to hear that you have enjoyed your stay, especially with our service staff, meals at Amaya Food Gallery, the new water parks, and the motion sensor at your room. Thank you for your kind compliments and for sharing your experience with us. I will humbly forward your feedback to our team members, as it is always satisfying to know that our efforts are recognised and we strive to exceed your expectations at every opportunity.   We appreciate you sharing your kind feedback with us. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Newly renovated room +Signature bedding +Good service
review: Very nice hotel, I love the atmostsphere around the hotel, especially the outdoor area around Amaya restuarant and the pool after renovation. The hotel is easy to access.  Various types of breakfast and so delicious.

title: Best family experience!
review: What makes our stay so pleasant was the staffs who are so attentive, friendly, and professional. We love the very fun pool, the beautiful modern-Asian styled room, and really enjoyed the restaurant there.

title: Amari Pattaya
review: Dear Sunshine45413387387,  Warm greetings from Amari Pattaya.  Thank you for taking the time to send your kind feedback. We are very grateful to hear that you’ve had a pleasant experience in regards to our services, the new swimming pools and water parks, our freshened room design, as well as our multicultural dishes at the breakfast buffet. I will make sure our team members know of your kind compliments as we strive to exceed your expectations at every opportunity.   We appreciate you sharing your experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Amari stay in week 25
review: Good holiday for Family and friends trip Enjoyable for kids Good service with friendly staffs Equipped with facility for kids and family Nice hotel decoration and surounding view Convenient location and car paking

title: Excellent hotel
review: Dear Happiness62106835392,  I am delighted to hear that you and your family have had a good holiday during your previous stay with us at Amari Pattaya. We are pleased to hear that you’ve enjoyed our facilities and the conveniences of the surroundings from our hotel. Thank you for your kind compliments in regards to our service and staff members. At Amari, we strive to deliver exceptional service, and it is always satisfying to receive feedback like this.  Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with us. We look forward to your next visit in the near future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Slide at your pool
review: Excellent service, accommodations and rooms with good atmosphere and relaxing environment. Room temperature to be adjusted by own need, Missing some more English speaking channels on the TV, that said in-room dining is very good with affordable prices.

title: Perfect Place to Stay in Pattaya for Families!
review: We booked this as a last minute overnight getaway from Bangkok and were pleasantly surprised by how perfect it was.  It seems they just renovated, and everything about the amenities and design of the hotel were great.  The staff are all so helpful and friendly, and they even had pool staff around where all the slides are to keep everyone safe.  Our kids never wanted to leave, and we technically never had to leave the hotel for any reason.  Great place for a break!

title: Family-friendly hotel
review: Dear T L,  I am delighted to hear that you and your family have thoroughly enjoyed your spontaneous getaway at Amari Pattaya. It is very nice to know that you find the new refurbishments, amenities, and facilities to your liking, and your children didn’t even want to leave! As well as thank you for your valuable and encouraging comments regarding our team members. I will be more than happy to share your comments with our entire team and we will surely keep up with the good work.  We look forward to your next visit in the near future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Staff friendly good service mind
review: Very friendly and good location but need a cleaner part. Room floor, dining plate, etc. There is not some food prepared at breakfast. It is a good hotel for family trips. Pool facilities are very good.

title: Upgraded room Fail
review: Dear Explore08227847362  I am grateful for your kind compliments in regards to our staff, location, and facilities. Although I am disappointed to hear that you did not find our room, dining plates, and other minor things to your cleanliness standard. I have discussed this internally to the departments associated and have moved forth with doing our best to prevent any negative guest experience.   Again, thank you for taking the time to send your review. We look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: A great stay in a great hotel
review: Exclutive lounge staff very good service but some problem is from management team policy that s make they can't  to show spirit of power they have  suite part not recommended to stay if you not rich and blind because tower part room is better

title: A Perfect and Awesome Stay!
review: Comfy bed to die for. Fantastic location & Fab Ocean view. The hotel is walking distance to shopping mall and  most popular attractions near by.  The room I stayed in with enormous windows and faced the beautiful ocean view.  Breakfast was awesome and delicious!     Service staff is really helpful and super friendly.    Thank you for the wonderful and the excellent service provided by your delightful employees I really enjoyed Amari Pattaya and would gladly go back!

title: Excellent Experience from Walk into Amari Pattaya :)
review: Dear iNatchaLee,  Thank you so much for taking the time to send your positive feedback. I am pleased to hear that you have enjoyed our room, facilities, breakfast buffet, even our location and view! It is always satisfying to receive feedback like this. Your comments are greatly appreciated. I will make sure to pass your compliments to all my team, as we strive to exceed your expectations at every opportunity.  We would be thrilled to welcome you back with us! We look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you again in the near future.   Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Great for kids
review: Nice Environment after Amari Pattaya Renovation Nice Front Office Staff with Efficient Check in & Check out Nice House Keeping with Daily Sort Out the Room Nice Wifi Coverage in Everywhere Nice Food & Coffee in F&B Section with Every Staffs Smile in the Morning Nice Swimming Pool & Gym  Nice Breeze Spa with Staff Profession Skill  ~~^_^~~

title: Fantastic trip
review: Dear Sherpa43752431801,  Warm greetings from Amari Pattaya.  Thank you for taking the time to send your feedback   IIt is always gratifying for the whole team to receive positive note like this, whether it is our staff, facilities, or even Breeze Spa! We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your time with us. Your kind compliments will be shared with all team members. At Amari, special emphasis is placed on staff training and it is always rewarding when guests voice their appreciation.  We look forward to welcoming you back should your travels bring you to Pattaya again.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Blue ocean
review: We stayed recently for 2 nights and was not aware that the new pool facilities were now available and this was a nice surprise for my son.  The last time we stayed here was just before the closure of the Garden wing and there is still some construction going on with a new Ozo hotel behind, but this was not really noticeable during our stay, even though you could see it.  The welcome by the staff was great as it was in the restaurant for breakfast and the front of house staff, including the security staff, we really helpful and pleasant.  The Amari brand is one of our favourites, and will always look to what is available during our travels.

title: Excellent trip
review: Once again we enjoyed an excellent trip with our family to our second home.  The hotel is ideally situated and benefits from a recent renovation.  Fantastic staff especially the Executive Lounge 19th floor staff who are all amazing.  The evening chef on this floor is fabulous and provides some of the best club food we have experienced throughout our travels.  Once again many thanks to all the wonderful staff for a memorable stay.  Thanks also to Khun Deborah for her excellent hosting skills.

title: Still one of the best in Pattaya
review: Dear Jan B,  Thank you for taking the time to review as it is always satisfying to receive feedback like this.  It is always our pleasure to be your choice hotel and to see you.   I appreciate your compliments to our staff and I will ensure to pass on to my team members.  In such a short space of time, it is so nice that you recognise and enjoy the changes made to the property.  I look forward to welcoming you back, and hopefully have more time on your next stay to have a glass of wine with you  Safe travels and see you again very soon  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Good Hotel
review: After the renovation, the hotel looks and feels very modern. The service is excellent. Breakfast is great. The new pool area is excellent now the whole family can enjoy the pool activities. The staff is very friendly and helpful.

title: Not as good as it used to be
review: Dear Quest34297530641,  Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience during your stay at Amari Pattaya. I am pleased to hear that you found our facilities satisfying and enjoyable. It is always gratifying for the whole team to receive feedback like this. Whilst we strive every day to deliver exceptional service, it is always nice to know when our efforts are recognised.   Again, we appreciate you sharing your experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you again, should you travels bring you back to Pattaya.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Listen to your Loved Ones Pooping :)
review: Good location. Walking distance to shopping complex and convenience stores. Hotel room are kinda big and good service. Hotel staff are initiative.  Prices are increased after renovation but overall value for price.

title: Almost perfect
review: Outstanding pool and kid's club. The service is good. The room is quite old and need some renovation. Some equipment is not in good condition. The restaurant does not have many variety and the food is quite slow. It's like not encourage guests to have dinner in the hotel.

title: 4-star with 5-star features
review: Dear Seaside10050180688,  Warm greetings from Amari Pattaya.  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your  experiences with us following your recent stay. I am delighted to hear that our swimming pool and Treehouse Kids Club are to your satisfaction. Although, I am sorry to hear that you find our new style and some equipments in the room need further  attention, which shall be followed up with our team.  The offer of 2 restaurants at the property reflects the competitive market where we are placed.  However, we have implemented a more frequent rotation of menu change, and Executive Chef is currently working on many special dishes that he shall bring to the table.  Again, we thank you for providing us with your comments. We look forward to welcoming you again in the future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: No hot water
review: If this Amari positions itself as a four star, than many Pattaya five start hotels should downgrade themselves. The rooms have interesting and smart layout, the bathroom is splendid, and the breakfast is top-notch, literally an ancient-Rome level fiest. All the staff members are very very friendly, asking, greeting, which is a major change compared to usually grumpy hotel staff in Thailand. The location is on the edge of the very center: IMHO the best balance.

title: Good location, close to shopping places
review: Dear Rattle7,  I am very pleased to hear that you’ve had a great experience with us. Thank you for taking the time to review as it is always satisfying to receive feedback like this. I am delighted to hear that you liked the new look and new feel, as well as our Amaya breakfast buffet.  I appreciate your compliments to our staff and I will ensure to pass on to my team members. At Amari, special emphasis is placed on staff training and it is always rewarding when guests voice their appreciation.   We look forward to welcoming you again, should your travels bring you back to Pattaya.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Clean pool and wonderful breakfast
review: Very nice hotel and room, and very friendly staff. Sad they tried to ask my Thai girl friend for ID when we came in.   Shower and bath only had hot water sometimes. Tried to have it fixed without any luck

title: Poor service
review: Poor service, I had booked for 3 rooms of deluxe king with bathtub. But they give us 2 rooms with bathtub and a room without bathtub. I ask reception after get the room, they said room with _19 have no bathtub. I want to change the room. They said all rooms is fully booked. So they can not change, can not refund. The one they can offer is upgrade room when i book next time. I refused this offer because i will not come back again for sure. So they offer money 1,500 baht for having lunch in the hotel. I refused it again cause i do not want to spend time in this hotel anymore. Finally they give us 50% off room rate for 1 room. RIP #Amaripattaya จองห้องมา 3 ห้องตอนจองมีรายละเอียดว่ามีอ่างอาบน้ำ พอมาถึงขึ้นห้องพบว่ามีอ่างแค่ 2 ห้อง และอีก 1 ห้อง ห้องที่ลงท้ายด้วย _19 ของทุกชั้น…

title: Room can be improve
review: Dear Nok_nicky,  We appreciate you taking the time to send your feedback.  I would like to offer you my most sincere apologies for not meeting your expectations during your last stay with us. I am disappointed to hear that our service was not up to  the required standard. The additional delays in appointing your room to supply you with an alternative room which met your requirements. Our focus is clear that we not only want to meet the expectations of each and every guest, but also strive to exceed them.   Assuring you of my personal attention, and that you will consider staying in our hotel again should you return to Pattaya. If this is possible, I would be delighted to make all the necessary arrangements to ensure that you will have a relaxing stay as should be expected from Amari Hotels.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: good amari
review: Had been regular to the hotel. Some improvement need to be done to the room including hot water shower and toilet flush. A little disappointed to know the swimming pool operating up to 7pm only. Was delighted the staff greet me and know who i'm.

title: excellent
review: Dear Peterkoh2018,  Warm greetings from Amari Pattaya.  Thank you for taking the time to send your review as your comments are very valuable to us as we strive to improve ourselves to exceed your expectations. As a regular guest your time taken is appreciated.  In regards to the hot shower and toilet flush,  the Chief Engineer has investigated the system and taken corrective  actions.   Swimming pool hours of operation follow the fall of darkness, in the interests of safety to our guests.  We actively adjust to follow the sunset, to ensure that we always have a clear line of sight of our guests.  Thank you for sharing your experience with us, and I  look forward to welcoming you back.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Best Stay in Pattaya
review: we had a pleasant trip with Amari. I was satisfied with the inside of the room except it was humid. I have a good position with kind employees. Breakfast smells strong. I'll be with Amari again next time.

title: Experience
review: Good room to stay &service. I will be back to stay and recommend every one booking room.The restaurant very variety food and clean with good staff service.I like swimming pool very nice and funny. The area very convenience go to the beach.

title: Enjoy staying here!
review: Dear sayjai p,  Warm greetings from Amari Pattaya.  I am very pleased to hear that you were having a great time at our stay! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your pleasant experience and your compliments to our team.  It is always refreshing to receive positive feedback. At Amari, special emphasis is placed on staff training, and it is always rewarding when guests voice their appreciation.  Without a doubt, we strive to keep and improve our exceptional service. We are delighted to hear that you will be back to stay with us! We look forward to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Amari Ocean Pattaya
review: Superb clean. Full line of breakfast buffet. Water park is huge. Comfy bed. Gym quite small. Good service. Will absolutely come back. Location is good. Close to big mall,terminal 21 so that you gonna enjoy best restaurant and dessert cafe there.

title: Excellent choice
review: Dear NiceTheTraveller,  Warm greetings from Amari Pattaya.  We appreciate you taking the time to send your kind reviews. It was indeed a pleasure to learn that you have enjoyed your stay with us. Whilst we strive every day to deliver exceptional service, it is always nice to know when our efforts are recognised.  Thank you again for sharing your experience. We look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Excellent stay
review: **** ข้อดี ****   - ผมใช้บริการฟิตแล้วลืมหูฟังไว้ที่นั้นช่วงบ่าย และนึกได้ตอนเช้าเลยได้สอบถามกับทางคุณแพร (คุณแพรน่ารัก บริการดี สอบถามตลอดทั้งผมเองและหลานๆ) ที่สำคัญพอคุณแพรทราบว่าของหายรีบช่วยดำเนินการตามหาให้ทันทีแล้วพบเจอ พนักงานน่ารักมากๆครับ  - คุณหมวยลี่ คุณไลลา และทีม Club บริการน่ารักตั้งแต่ตอน Check in จนถึงวัน Check Out บริการดีมากๆ จนหลานๆที่มาด้วยชอบ เครื่องดื่มดีทั้ง Soft drink & Alcohol ตลอด 2 ชั่วโมงคุ้มค่ามาก อาหารดี เสียดาย Afternoon Tea อาหารน้อยไปหน่อยครับ   - สวนน้ำ สระว่ายน้ำเหมาะสมและสนุกมาก น้องๆพนักงานที่คอยดูแลบริการดี อัธยาศัยดี คอยดูแลหลานๆและคนมาใช้บริการอย่างดี  - พนักงานทำความสะอาดห้องน่ารัก ยิ้มแย้ม และทำห้องสะอาดทุกวันที่เข้าพัก 2 คืน   - เตียงนอนสบายมากครับ หมอนดี นุ่ม ผ้าห่มอุ่นเวลาดึกๆอากาศเย็น วิว บรรยากาศ ให้เต็ม 10 ครับ   **** ข้อปรับปรุง…

title: Amazing Amari ! Excellent location, staff, pool, breakfast !
review: Again a very good experience at Amari. Everything excellent : people first, staff is really king helpful and smiling. Location is wonderful : 8 meters from the beach, can walk to Terminal 21... ! Breakfast is important ... and at Amari it's really fresh and good. And the pool is big, trendy, well organized for either adults or families. Last point : a kids club that kids loved. Thx to the staff. We'll come back again :-)

title: good hotel
review: Dear Brusky07,  Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience during your stay at Amari Pattaya. I am pleased to hear that you found our facilities satisfying and enjoyable. It is always gratifying for the whole team to receive feedback like this. Whilst we strive every day to deliver exceptional service, it is always nice to know when our efforts are recognised.   Again, we appreciate you sharing your experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you again, should you travels bring you back to Pattaya.  Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Excellent
review: I want to visit again good hotel~~~~~~~~   very kindless  and  good location  The swimming pool is very nice.  I didn't eat breakfast, but it looks good 위치는 파타야북부고요 좋았어요 룸컨디션도좋고 와이파이 생각보다 빨라요 한국티비 tvn 나오고요 수영장 3개라 애들노는 수영장이따로있어요  미끄럽틀이랑 여러가지가있어서 애들놀기도 좋아요  주변에 공사중인곳이있어서 시끄러울줄알았는데 생각보다 괜찮았어요  밤에는 확실히  조용하고 잠자기도 좋아요  룸은 꽤 큰편이라  좋았어요

title: Worst Service
review: Dear OnAir16543491232,  Thank you so much for taking the time to send your positive feedback. I am pleased to hear that you have enjoyed our facilities. Your comments are greatly appreciated as we strive to exceed your expectations at every opportunity.  We look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you back in the near future.   Kind Regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Reliable
review: Exceeded expectations. It has one of the best pools and rooms are spacious and well designed. Staff was courteous and room service prompt. Location also very good where you can just move out and either walk or take tuktuk

title: Superb refit
review: I have stayed at this hotel since 2006 and throughout the years of renovation. The rooms are all now refreshed and modern. The foyer/atrium is superb. The breakfast area is lovely.  Service as always is the real high point of this hotel. All staff without exception are superb.  I do however have one reservation, the new pool complex is clearly tailored towards kids. I am worried it will get very noisy as the kids enjoy the many slides , water guns and other kid related features. This wasn't a problem at my recent visit as the hotel wasn't busy.  I intend to return in August and November and will decide whether or not to continue using this hotel then.

title: GREAT STAFF
review: Dear leethomaswales,  We are very grateful to hear that you have been choosing us for your service throughout the years, even during the renovation. I will make sure our Team Members know of your kind compliments and strive to exceed your expectations at every opportunity.   I will take notes of your prior concerns regarding the new swimming pool area and will do best to provide an environment of your convenience.  We look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you back in August and November, and I hope we can service you as well in the future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Absolutely amazing
review: We have stayed many times at Amari over the years both through work and holiday and were excited to see the results of the renovation programme.  We very much enjoyed our stay and many of the original staff are still there which truly made our stay.  Reception staff were always cheery and keen to assist.   The renovation has now  changed to a family resort with the swimming pool purely for families - I have no objection to this but there is nowhere for some private space at the swimming pool.  We enjoy reading but it was difficult to find a quiet spot. Also the cost of the rooms has rocketed since the renovation.  We have checked the prices for the year ahead (even with offers and supersale prices) your cost has risen too much.   We stayed at the Dusit during renovation and will…

title: need morf display
review: Dear May2507,  Thank you for taking the to send us your feedback. We are glad to hear that our renovation programme and services did provide you a decent time during your stay.   In regards to your comment about the private spaces and noise concerns, we do understand and sincerely apologise for disappointing you with your experience. We will try best to further improve our environment and guest experience to prevent any similar occurrences.  We do apologise for your inconvenience and hope that you consider our service again in the future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Wonderful vacation
review: I loved my stay at amari it was good in all aspect . The whole staff of this beautiful property needs a pat on their back , the way they handle their guest and take care of them is much appreciable. The food is good , the rooms are big and clean . The pool area is well kept and is a great place to relax . Overall would visit again .

title: Lovely stay
review: A wonderful experience in customer service - very welcoming.  Location was fantastic and a lovely view of the sea.  Pool was well maintained. Choice of breakfast was good.  All of the service we received we could find no fault.

title: An Outstanding Hotel to Make You Feel At Home!
review: Dear J J,  It is very nice to know that you enjoyed your recent stay at Amari Pattaya. Thank you for your valuable and encouraging comments regarding our team members. I will be more than happy to share your comments with our entire team.  We look forward to your next visit in the near future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: New pool is awesome!
review: This hotel is a Must Stay Hotel with an outstanding staff and nice clean modern rooms and excellent food.  I will stay here again when i return to Pattaya.  Order the Amari Burger from room service if you like burgers. Their homemade ketchup makes my mouth water thinking about it...Trust me, i don't kid about food!  LOL

title: Good
review: Dear russlawyer,  It was great to read your positive feedback of your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya and to learn that you had a wonderful stay. We appreciate you recommending us and look forward to your return for your next stay with us.   Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Wonderful and Nice Hotel
