review: New pool is well-equipped. Impressive and definitely coming back for it. The service at front desk was quick despite a number of people checking in and out during long weekend. The hotel is obviously being renovated but the construction has no impact on staying there. The view overlooking the pool area is superb--better than expected. Just beyond satisfied all in all : )

title: Nice beach front hotel
review: Nice hotel, renovated room, very clean place and friendly staff. Recommended for solo/couple or family, they have a big swimming pool and "water park" for kids. Breakfast have a good selection of food.

title: Cleaner's sense
review: Dear StefanoB1567  I was delighted to read your positive feedback. It is wonderful to know that you and your family had an enjoyable time during your stay at Amari Pattaya and especially our newly opened Aqua Park. We look forward to welcoming you again on a future occasion.  We look forward to your next visit in the near future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: MEMORABLE MEMORIES
review: I loved the fact that I provided room service according to the customer's taste. I will revisit the kindness of the cleaning lady. I will also recommend it to my acquaintances. I think it would be nice to have someone at the front desk who can speak Korean.

title: A good holiday.
review: Dear Journey02193766643,  Thank you for kind feedback regarding your recent stay at Amari Pattaya and for your encouraging comments about our team members. We highly appreciate you recommending us and would return to stay at Amari Pattaya again in the future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Excellent Hotel for Business Trips
review: The newly renovated rooms have a great look and quality and quantity of the room size is hard to compare in Pattaya . The pool is fully operational and looks awesome and lots of activity for the kids . The breakfast at the newly renovated Amaya is great with the service and quality . The lobby looks fantastic and the staff at the bell desk , concierge , check in all doing a great job to make one feel at home . The newly renovated club floor is indeed a place to relax in the evening and see the sundowner with the staff taking care of all your needs .

title: Great Vacation with Great Location
review: Clean and big room with amazing sea view , Kids pool and play zone best part for the family to keep the children busy.  i am happy with amari ocean wonderful stay everything is nice specially  front deck and house keeping.                            Just one small request to increase Indian menu in breakfast and keep the food warm , so that taste look good.

title: It is the best hotel
review: Dear Pioneer31950376731,  Thank you for kind feedback regarding your recent stay at Amari Pattaya and for your encouraging comments about our team members at the reception desk and housekeeping. Thank you also for your comments regarding Indian menu. Rest assured, I will discuss with our Executive Chef for improvement.  We look forward to your next visit in the near future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Great vacation
review: They are very kind and polite. Breakfast is very delicious and there are many menus. Many children can play in the pool and the service is very good. The room is very clean and clean. I want to come here again.

title: My excellent experience at Amari Pattaya
review: Dear Sightsee12617686572,  It was great to read your positive feedback of your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya and to learn that you had a wonderful stay. Thank you for your encouraging comments regarding our service and facilities.   We look forward to your next visit to Pattaya and would love to welcome you back to Amari Pattaya.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Nice hotel
review: My first time there. Staff are friendly well mannered and sincere.They made surprise birthday for us. Khun Pare (Host) very kind and good take care both of us. Pool area is nice and hotel good location convenient to transportation. I will come back next time. See you soon!!

title: Good hotel, amari
review: It was a great experience about my first visit to Thailand. I will stay at this hotel even if I visit Thailand next time. I hope you can take care of it as a good service next time. Thank you and thank you.

title: 21 March 2019
review: Dear Freedom44611489574,  Thank you for kind feedback regarding your recent stay at Amari Pattaya. I am happy to learn that you have truly enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to your return to Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Oh dear!!!!!
review: Excellent location and facilities, nice view, convenient, floor look old (tile) seem difficult to clean but good in anti slip, all staff are willing to service with smile and assist, overall are in very good rate.

title: Great hotel with great location
review: Dear Trek22813813178,  Thank you very much for your positive review. I am delighted that our staff has always been able to deliver a high level of service to exceed your expectations.  We look forward to your return to Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: naphob
review: In fairness we didn't stay here on this trip.  We decided to give it a miss and stayed nearby, due to the building work.  I went into the hotel one day to look around and have to say , very nice job of updating the rooms and reception area.  But outside OOPS !!!!!!!   The lovely pool area has been ravaged and the gardens where we have spent many relaxing and sunny hours GONE!!!! The pool area is laid out in tiers and all the beds are laid out side by side reminiscent of the Spanish Costa hotels.  They have installed a loopy slides and big buckets that overturn every 30 seconds or so.It is all very close together and the bright plastics make it lovely for the kids but not so great for adults without kids. Having torn down the old outdated blocks of rooms in the gardens they have…

title: A fantastic hotel and excellent helpful staff.
review: Seasoned travellers, it has been a while since we were in Thailand and where to begin.  This hotel and moreso, the staff are outstanding and you will certainly not be dissapinted staying here.   We visited towards the end of a huge renovation of the hotel and the results are outstanding.  Plus points: Hotel is in North Pattaya, just a 10 minute drive by tuk tuk to Walking Street costing a mere 25 pence per person.  Room was large with a superb view from our window on the 12th floor. Free safe in the room, together with tea and coffee making facilities. Breakfast was excellent with a huge choice of food. Wifi – excellent both in the hotel room, and the rest of the hotel, including the pool area. Staff. Outstanding, friendly and could not do enough for you to ensure your stay was…

title: Excellent hotel
review: Dear fredgT5809AR,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write your positive review. I am happy to learn that you were impressed with our service and thoroughly enjoyed your stay.  We highly appreciate you recommending our hotel to TripAdvisor community. We look forward to welcoming you whenever you decide to visit Pattaya again in the near future.  With kind regards,  Deborah Haines, Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Excellent Stay!
review: Refurbished since I last stayed here. Room was great. Very clean and bed was the epitome of comfort. Staff were exceptionally good. Always professional, helpful and friendly. I was asked once by security to show key card - fair enough. Pool and pool bar great, grounds very well kept and clean. Ongoing construction of what seems to be a new building but it didnt bother me at all. Deserves 5 stars.

title: Relaxing Stay
review: Dear Flyer33741982653,  Thank you very much for your very positive feedback regarding your recent stay at Amari Pattaya. I am happy to learn that you have enjoyed your stay and our new swimming pool.   We appreciate you recommending us and look forward to your return for your next stay with us in the near future.  With kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Bad Food
review: Second time staying in Amari Pattaya and they do not disappoint. Our last stay was two years ago and to be frank everything just got better than before. From the room to all the staffs, everything was perfect. We stayed in room #1201 with the view of the Ocean right infront of us. We would highly recommend this room to anyone.  In regards to the location of the hotel, the hotel is located in one of the most convenient spots in Pattaya. With the beach right infront of the hotel and shopping malls and restaurants all around. Everywhere necessary was in walking distance.  We surely hope to return back to Amari Pattaya since we are very well ensured that a good time is promised!

title: A cosy and peaceful beachfront experience
review: I stayed for 1 day in the Amari Pattaya on a business trip. When I arrived there was a lady playing live music in the foyer which resonated beautifully around the huge space. The rest of the stay was equal to that magical moment. Great staff and a good breakfast coupled with a wonderful room view.

title: Amari Pattay
review: Dear Camper56662060589,  Thank you for kind feedback regarding your recent stay at Amari Pattaya. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and had a relax stay during your business trip.   We look forward to your return to Amari Pattaya again in the near future.  With kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Perfect with a warm welkom
review: down graded business hotel, the hotel is slowly turning in a low cost mass tourist facility from a upgrade business hotel. As a company we will start trying alternative options in Pattaya. After using Amari the last 20 years !

title: Best Pattaya Stay
review: Dear Nomad44770827370,  Thank you for your kind feedback. It is our great pleasure that you have stayed with us on a number of occasions during the last 20 years.  I am sorry to read that your recent stay did not live up to your expectations. Our focus is clear in that we not only want to meet the expectations of each and every guest, but also strive to exceed them.  I do apologise for this disappointing experience. We hope that however you will consider staying with us again in the future and allow us to show you the results of our efforts after refurbishment completed for our new Executive Club floors and lounge. We assure you that our renewed efforts will not leave you disappointed again.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Superb Hotel
review: Our stay in Amai was the most perfect time of our vacation. The luxery of the lobby, the rooms, the friendly staff, the cleannish, the location and the breakfast was really  a 5 star. We enjoyed it very much

title: thanks for your warmth & kindness
review: location is very convenient to go around pattaya. room condition is always satisfied  the people of amari treat my family with warm heart. and their smile makes me cozy. most of all, my family like breakfast.

title: My Amari Review
review: Dear irooda,  Thank you for your wonderful feedback. I am delighted that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us and was impressed with our service.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   With kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Eastern Thailand

title: Nice modern Hotel at beach
review: We stayed at the Amari in January 2019 for 6 nights. Our room was a Deluxe room with pool view. The first thing I should mention is that there was quite an amount of construction under way at the time of our visit. The hotel did their best to ameliorate any negative impact this might have on guests. I was not particularly bothered by this, however depending on the purpose of your visit you might feel differently.  The lobby is impressive with very high ceilings and is of a high standard throughout both in terms of workmanship and materials used. The rooms are spacious, stylish and well appointed. Our pool view room also had a view of the beach which was nice.   The staff were very friendly and professional. The breakfast was excellent.  I had a couple of swims at the pool. It…

title: EXCELLENT
review: Good hotel with great service and attention for detail. You are treated as a real guest. Great location , at beach and on ricght distance from night live , not to close for noice , not to far to walk to. Only down side was some construction work ongoing in part of the pool area

title: Beautiful Hotel & Amazing Staff
review: Just enjoyed a lovely stay at the Amari where the 2 year renovation programme is almost complete.  Lovely warm welcome from the bell boys under the supervision of Woody.  Check in was extremely quick from the reception girls - prompt arrival of luggage to our lovely room with excellent views of the bay (very well looked after by Amorn).  Location of the hotel is great (at the quieter end of Pattaya) but very easy access everywhere on the baht buses.  Also the new Terminal 21 is a very short walk away.  Breakfast was always good with many choices - thanks to Nong Nong, Jira, Oh, etc - also thanks to the very hard working Nong for our daily golf cart lifts.  The new pool is looking great - all well looked after by Surasak, Bank and the team.  Special thanks to Khun Na, Khun…

title: back at my second home
review: This Hotel I can to recommend to all which will stay in Pattaya. It’s an excellent business hotel with all service which you need for do your business. The stuffs are very friendly and helpful. All it’s perfect.

title: No Value for Money
review: Dear steffen922,  It was great to read your positive feedback of your recent stay with us. Thank you for regarding us as your “second home”. I am delighted that our team members have done their best and pro-actively provided service which has exceeded your expectations.  We look forward to welcoming you back to your home in the near future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Awful experience
review: Communication in English with Hotel Staff is a major issue even though they are very polite and helpful.F&B leaves a lot to be desired.Location is excellent on the beach road.They should mention during the reservation that there is construction in the hotel at present.

title: Excellent
review: Dear AsitA4,  Thank you for your review.   I am sorry to hear about the English language skills of our team members. We do have ongoing English lessons for our team members in every department and the level is continually improving.   I apologise for any inconvenience caused from the renovation works during your visit. I will ensure that all guests will not miss posted renovation notice from our website and the travel agents prior to arrival.  We do hope that you will give us another chance and consider staying in our hotel again in the near future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Leisure trip
review: Booked this hotel last year  Been here before and had good experience  unfortunately not this time   Hotel is very average, dirty room ( found someone’s dirty socks behind the curtain), dirty bed linen and not very clean bathroom.  Hotel does major update( building new hotel nest to existing one -  so instead relax you will have constant noise.  They charge full rate for rooms and offer you terrible experience.  They didn’t bother to send an email with explanation what they doing around the hotel.   I would never stay here if I knew what they doing.  They just said on arrival they have some refurbishment ongoing..... lies sweet lies  You can’t rest and enjoy at swimming pool area as only what you will get is noice from next door.   Horrible experience.  Hotel is run down, it…

title: Annual pilgrimage to Pattaya and the Amari
review: This was the ninth year out the Amari for an annual 2 week golf trip. The hotel gets better each year. Will be back again as usual next year. The new renovated rooms are outstanding quality and the rest of the refurbishments will be finished middle of 2019. Cannot recommend the hotel any higher.

title: Room with a building site
review: When booking this hotel they should make it very clear the amount of building work going on, it fine if your stay is for the room only and your not going to use the pool area or need a coffee or refreshment as the hotel has no restaurant. The bedroom was great but at the time the building work was very noisy.

title: Hotel cleanliness
review: Dear chris-di-tour,  Thank you very much for your review. We do apologise for any inconvenience caused by the renovation work during your stay with us.   We hope that you will consider staying with us again in the future and look forward to welcoming you back.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Impressive Thai Greeting and Care Taking
review: Dirty room, didn’t change bed linen after requesting, sticky floor after requesting for mopping, over all room doesn’t clean as it should. Room patio have only one chair, no outlet in bathroom, stiff bed and uncomfortable.

title: Decent hotel but will be better once construction finishes
review: Dear Voyager17380744248,  Thank you for sharing your experience regarding your recent stay with us. We are sorry to read that your room did not live up to your expectations due to the issue with cleanliness. Rest assured we will address all issues with relevant department heads for the required improvements. Please accept our sincere apologies.   We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit to Pattaya and will do our utmost to make your stay even more memorable than your recent visit.  With kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Decent property
review: I booked at Amari Pattaya just for a day while on travel at work. I think the property is on renovation ( they warned me after I confirmed the booking at Booking.com).  The property is fine..once renovation is completed, it will be very nice I think.  Food is outstanding in Mantra restaurant, also room service is served from same place. Not sure it’s a permanent arrangement or because of renovation. Anyway we had good meal experience.

title: Not bad for business trip
review: Dear Pumashan,  Thank you very much for taking the time to post your positive feedback on your recent stay at Amari Pattaya.   I was pleased to read that overall you had an enjoyable stay and found the food offering was great. Due to the renovation of our new all day dining "Amaya" restaurant, all meals including room service is now served at Mantra Restaurant for temporary. Our new Amaya Restaurant will be ready for service soon.  We look forward to your return to Amari Pattaya in the near future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Building Site
review: Nowadays, this hotel is been constructing for new buliding. So, you should go to outside restaurant for breakfast. and consider when you use swimming pool, because swimming pool is located between constrution site. Except construction, all service is good!!

title: Post stay opinion
review: Dear heeukkim,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your positive and constructive feedback. I am happy to know that you enjoyed your stay and our service. Despite the partial renovation work at swimming pool area, we do ensure non disturbance to our guest comfort and enjoyment. This includes 6-metre high hoarding fence which screen off the renovation works.   We look forward to welcoming you back to Amari Pattaya in the near future.  Kind regards,  Deborah Haines Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Time spent in Pattaya
review: Nice hotel and would suit family vacation. However, at the moment although open and charging a high rate it is a building site with construction works surrounding the hotel! Should be nice and worth the money once completed.

title: Family Hotel
review: I started here recently for 4 nights...all the staff were very courteous and helpful....there are certain renovations ongoing so the kids pool/splash will be open by February and the in hotel dining is also under renovation, so the breakfast is at Mantra which is a 2 minute golf cart ride away.....but all in all very satisfied by the rooms, staff, location and services

title: Super hotel at convient location in PTT
review: A nice hotel with a great view of the PTT bay. Located at the end of the Beach Rd. but still in waking dist. from Center Festival and other shops. Right next to the beach, and far away from loud and noisey streets. Good value for money.

title: Great stay.
review: Fantastic hotel, with friendly & helped staff. I’ve stayed in many of the high end hotels in Pattaya & this one is my favourite.I have looked at this hotel before, but didn’t stay because it’s on the northern end of beach road, but it wasn’t a problem.Great rooms & reasonable price.

title: Good experience
review: We stayed at this hotel for 12 nights and we were really happy. The staff were very friendly. The hotel was modern and clean. Breakfast was varied and tasty. The location at the northern end of Pattaya Beach is also good. Local buses (songthaew's) run right in front of the hotel and the Terminal 21 Shopping Center is in walking distance.

title: Nice relaxing property
review: Went for a 2 night stay at this beautiful hotel right in front of the beach ..Staff was courteous and were kind enough to check us in early .Food at mantra was great . Must try .Even the cocktail at mantra was excellent and priced reasonably

title: More than satisfied..!!
review: We stayed for 2 nights in an ocean view room. Although the ocean view was at an angle but still the view was mesmerizing. The room was spacious, clean and amenities were plenty.. Amari never fails to impress me. The hotel staff is helpful and courteous to another level.. And now the highlight.. during our breakfast my wife being a pure vegetarian was struggling to find vegetarian options. Although it was a huge spread but pure vegetarian people are very careful with breads, cakes and spreads. One of the chefs SRIDHAR KARNATI(I vividly remember the name) surprised us with a masala dosa..he also made masala chai for us. He also made North Indian style masala omlate for me. We were overjoyed..he also helped us identify the in-house eggless preparation of breads and spreads. …

title: Location is perfect
review: Dear SaurabhVirmani86,  Thank you for kind feedback regarding your recent stay at Amari Pattaya and for your encouraging comments about our team members especially Mr. Sridhar. I am delighted that our service provided during your stay has exceeded your expectations.  We are excited to welcome you back during your next visit to Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Overall best hotel.
review: When I arrived, my room was not ready so I had to wait for about 60-90min. When I checked in, I asked for a late check out on my departure day, and was told that it would cost me a full days rate, as I was leaving so late. But as I had to wait so long for my room, the staff in the end, gave me this free of charge. And that is a great way to start my stay, and get my first impression of hotell and staff!   I had a "Junior suite ocean view" on the 11th floor, if I remember correctly, and there was two things that hit me when I first came in to the "suite". How small the so called suite was, and the incredible view from the the whole side of the wall, that was just big windows. Very nice!  The room otherwise, or the so called suite, was nothing special. And for the price there are…

title: A very nice property to stay and enjoy the Pattaya trip
review: Family atmosphere, caring staff, delicious food, best services.Location is very good.Serving tasty Indian food.Personal touch like celeberating birthdays by lovely hotel team members feeling family atmosphere.Best house keeping service.

title: Osum
review: Dear Meander44684422962,  It was great to read your positive feedback of your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya and to learn that you had a wonderful stay. Thank you for your encouraging comments regarding our service. I am delighted that our team members have done their best to respond to your needs which has met your expectations.  We look forward to your return to Pattaya and would love to welcome you back to your Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: It’s well maintained property work still going on with the project what no disturbance to the guests
review: So my recommendation is very positive need to finish work soon I will recommed this to every one breakfast is the best I have ever seen all the staff are very very good food is very very nice so go and enjoy

title: Excellent staff make the hotel
review: Dear Explorer703289,  Thank you for your review. It is very nice to know that you enjoyed your stay at Amari Pattaya despite our ongoing renovation works.   We look forward to become your favourite choice of hotel when visiting Pattaya again next time when all works are completed.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Pattaya Best - Ocean View
review: First things first there is a lot of construction work going on at the hotel, if this sort of thing bothers you I suggest you book once it's over. For us the room we had and the excellent staff more then made up for the noise. Check in was very professional cool towels and chilled drinks were provided while the pleasent staff sorted everything out. Alas we were not told till we got to the room that somebody had gone through the mains power and taken out the air conditioning.  Did not worry at the time as we went for a wander round Pattaya. On getting back however there was still no AC and the hotel and our room was very hot. On going back to reception to see what was going on the excellent staff arranged for the bar to be opened early and gave us happy hour drinks. I appreciate…

title: Excellent hotel with exceptionally good staff
review: This hotel is walking distance to beach. Good buffet breakfast. I understand that  this hotel is till under renovation. Good for family and friends stay. You will like it. Good massage places is on walking distance.

title: Excellent Hotel for Family
review: This hotel has always been the best hotel in this city. Although there is construction work going on but things are pretty much running as normal. You do get looked after properly at this place. Problem solving with a smile is a key skill the staff have. Will definitly visit this place next stay.

title: Happy time with family/ best hotel ever
review: I came here for 1 night with my family very huge room and good location in north Pattaya quiet place and nice for buffet breakfast and Sunday brunch reasonable price. Love to stay with Amari we will back again

title: Good staff
review: Everyone very nice smile and very friendly.I hope that renovation will finally be completed and quiet environment will come...........Sorry that I could not relax because of the noise of the construction in the pool.

title: Great Hotel in Pattaya!
review: Dear Dream45750278425,  Thank you very much for your review. I am delighted to learn you found that our staff has done their best to respond to your needs and fulfilled your expectations in a friendly manner.  I am sorry to hear though that you could not rest well due to the noise disturbance at the swimming pool. We hope that you will nevertheless consider staying with us again in the future and look forward to welcoming you back.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Amazing..great experience.
review: Very nice experience, despite some work that they are doing for reneval the structure, we receive a very good service and courtesy overall. They demonstrated a great flexibility considering that our fly was at midnight and we did the check in at 1PM. I strongly reccomended!!!

title: Awesome stay with Amari
review: Dear Paradise06476823319,  It is very encouraging to read your positive feedback and to learn that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. We really appreciate you recommending us to Trip Advisor community.  We look forward to your next visit and would love to welcome you back to your Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Service with a smile
review: Excellent property. Far from hustle and bustle of the city. Beautifully designed and a great location, just opposite the beach. This time happened to be my husband's birthday and your staff did a great job in surprising us in the evening. Thank you very much.

title: Excellent stay for family at Amari
review: We spent 4 nights here and had a memorable stay. The reception staff were very warm and friendly. An enjoyable buffet breakfast, kids club and a great location opposite the beach were the other highlights for us. The hotel is close to some of the attractions like Art in Paradise, Ripleys etc. and also a Mall with good options. The Indian restaurants around the hotel that we tried were a bit unwelcome and that probably was the only blemish in the stay. Based on my experience, I will certainly stay in an Amari property if the situation arises.

title: Fantastic Stay!!!
review: We had such a great time, staying at Amari. Staffs were fantastic. Our Kids loved and definitely would like to visit again. And we look forward to a new waterpark you are building. Minor comment is it would be nicer if the restaurant is closer to the main building but you provide cart service to the restaurant and our kids loved that ride.

title: Staff
review: Excellent service by the entire Amari staff well done seeing forward to come back again good hospitality polite while taking helpful and also gave a surprise birthday celebration was well organized.Great team work . Thanks

title: Wodeful Amari
review: Dear Culture42112154122,  It is very nice to know that you enjoyed your stay at Amari Pattaya. Thank you for your valuable and encouraging comments regarding our team members. I will be more than happy to share your comments with our entire team.  We look forward to become your favourite choice of hotel when visiting Pattaya again next time.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Great hotel.
review: Amari offers a fine quality and value-for-money hotel. My room was most comfortable and was made to feel very comfortable by the friendly and delightful staff. The pool area was good, although there could have been more shade provided. The lack of a restaurant in the hotel building limited the restaurant options to the Mantra, a short walk away, which I did not avail myself. However, overall I was very happy with the hotel and look forward to returning when all the renovations are completed.

title: Graet Hotel
review: a place to return, despite the construction site and noise it is a wonderful hotel with very nice staff in a very good location at the beginning of Pattaya beach. The new pool area will be very nice in the future. I'm already curious how it will be on my next visit ;-)

title: Fabulous hotel
review: Amazing hotel, one of the very best in Pattaya and an oasis of calm but within easy reach of walking street and all the nightlife. Really recommend the duplex suites - just amazing! Staff were great, nothing was too much trouble or and club access meant we really didn’t eat much that needed paying for ;)

title: One of the best place to stay while in Pattaya
review: One of the best property. Though there was a renovation work going on it was never disturbing. Thanks to every staff out there for making this trip very special for us. Would love to visit the place again and experience the upcoming facility

title: Excellent hotel
review: From the moment we arrived until we left we cannot thank all the staff from management and front desk staff & restaurant with a excellent choice of food there is a hotel extension going on but had minimal inconvenience we would like to thank Layla in reception who spoke excellent English for all local information she gave us.Thanks again Amari we had a wonderful stay PS the breakfast is not to be missed

title: Excellent Service
review: All service including laundry, clean room, kindness of front desk were excellent. In addition, new big shopping mall (terminal 21) is located at the vicinity of AMARI Pattay.I will reuse AMARI Pattaya for next business trip.

title: Excellent Hotel
review: The stay was very nice and convienient. when you're on a Business trip, you hardly don't recognize the construction work except the longer distance to go for breakfastThe staff was very helpful, and request was handled quickly to my satisfaction.

title: Beware of Renovation and Construction Issues
review: Our family have been to the Amari Ocean Pattaya several times over the years and have generally been quite happy. Unfortunately this visit was negatively affected by the construction and renovation taking place and we would hesitate to go back until it is completed.   PROS - The staff at the Amari were incredibly friendly. From the people greeting us in the lobby to even the housekeeper (special call out to the friendly older woman on the 8th floor) we were greeted warmly wherever we went.  - New lobby is clean and spacious - Rooms are spacious and modern - Very nice view of Pattaya Bay from rooms facing South - Hotel is very close to the beach - Mantra next door is one of the best restaurants in Pattaya - Website was easy to use for booking  CONS - Renovation taking place on…

title: Beautiful Hotel at the ocean with excellent service
review: Dear JW8448,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your detailed review. It is our great pleasure that you and your wife have stayed with us on a number of occasions and always had a great time. However we are sorry to read that this recent stay did not live up to your expectations due to the on-going renovation in the hotel.   I am sincerely sorry that there was an issue with the swimming pool close during your stay due to heavy rain storm has caused mud slide. We therefore need to close the pool to ensure its cleanliness and hygiene standards are being restored. Please accept our sincere apologies once again.  We are sorry that your room did not live up to your expectations and that there were issues with cleanliness and paint smell. I do apologise about this and have taken immediate actions to prevent this from occurring again. However I was glad that our team members were able to manage and resolve the issue with friendly service.  The points you raised are opportunities for us to improve our products and standards of service. Again, thank you for taking the time to bring these very relevant matters to my attention. I have taken immediate actions with my team to address all issues.  We do hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back again in a freshly new design of Amari Pattaya. We do guarantee you and your wife the relaxing memorable holidays you rightfully expect from us at Amari Pattaya.   With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: good
review: Very nice Hotel. The room was comfortable and nicely decorated, very cosy feeling. It felt like a staying in some luxurious home. The staff was friendly and provided good service. Excellent rooms and service as compared to other hotel stay at Bangkok.

title: LOVELY STAY
review: We have just returned from a lovely stay at the Amari Ocean.  This hotel is ideally situated on Beach Road with easy access to all locations.  Very welcoming arrival by 'Woody' and 'M', quick check in by Lyla and prompt arrival to our room (English spoken to a high standard).  This hotel has been going through a renovation project over the last 18 months so its always nice to return to see the improved services.  Any total renovation project is always very difficult for Management and staff but during our stay every single employee we encountered from pool boys to reception and everyone in between went out of their way to make our stay memorable - this is a total endorsement of the excellent management.  The staff all support each other and cover many different departments in…

title: Warm Hotel
review: All the staffs were professional and kind. Beds are comfortable and food was yammy. Location is easy to access to the main Shopping malls and beach side. Being far from Wallking Street, it was not  crowded and quiet.

title: Awesome Luxurious Hotel
review: I arrived at night.. hotel is very quiet through out the day n night just little noise in day time because of the construction going onn but it wont effect or bother your stay.   Very very clean awesome room comfy bed great amenetiies.. just opossite the beach and it is located on the beach road. Can get tuk tuk easily in front of the hotel. Very nice will come back again staff all helpful.

title: Great hotel right next to the beach
review: Dear SupriyoG34  Thank you for your review. I was pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and found the hotel is in good location. We highly appreciate you recommending us on the TripAdvisor community, and that you would return to stay at Amari Pattaya again in the future.   We look forward to welcoming you back whenever you decide to visit Pattaya again in the near future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Nice
review: Please be warned they are undergoing construction of new buildings on the hotel grounds so there will be some noise but they are due to finnish Dec 18. Staff are the best part of the hotel very warm and welcoming.

title: Stay in amari ocean pattaya
review: Excellent staff even though hotel was under renovations had a great stay the location is excellent May be when the renovations are finished it will be the best all in all had a memorable stay all kudos to the staff

title: best place to stay with family and friends
review: I was very impressed with the hotel and staff and love the room Ocean view . and i celebrate my best birthday so it was very spl for me, i always prefer this is hotel when ever i visited and already two times i stay and looking for more to stay

title: Room and impression
review: Dear Jayanth N,  It was great to read your positive feedback of your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya and to learn that you had a wonderful birthday celebration with us.  I am delighted to know that you would return to stay with us again in the future and look forward to welcoming you when that day arrives.   With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: lovely stay besides construction works.
review: i was very impressed from the new lobby.  The congrotsches in the room wasn´t nice!the breakfast in the Mantra is very good with a nice atmosphäre. The team is very kind and support a lot.thank you very  much and kind regards

title: Love this place and it’s beautiful staff
review: stayed a week here in a suite overlooking the ocean on the 15th floor. room with king bed, bath and separate walk in shower (with rainhead). There is also a small balcony with a chair and table. All the staff are wonderful....security, reception, cleaning. Always a smile and a wave.  The location of the hotel is a big plus...on the beach road, but at the end, away from the noise and busy life of walking street. Saying that , a simple TuTut ride was very easy and extremely cheap ($1)  The Executive club is being renovated so was not available. I ate breakfast at the Mantra restaurant, part of the Amari, was amazing and upperclass, I book through the hotel website and got free breakfast.  Now... a word of advice, the hotel renovation program is a bit misleading.....it is a major…

title: Amazing
review: Amazing tour Next time we will surely stay in amari ocean pattaya hotelBeing an indianWe have faced issues with breakfast or food otherwise it was outstanding Kindly add some indian dishesh in Breakfast so that we also can have good food

title: Excellent services from all staff
review: From our arrival to departure, staff at Amari Ocean were extremely helpful and trying to facilitate us best they could. We are family of 2 young toddler and baby so we had loads of stuff with us. Reception staff was with one of my children when the father went to get the car. The waitress at Mantra Restaurant offered to hold the small baby so that I could eat properly (though i refused her politely, i felt she was really trying to help). I was a little disappointed with the Kids Club and the pool since they were not fully functioned but the staff made up for it. My kids really enjoyed the stay. Thank you Amari Ocean Pattaya.

title: Nightmare in Amari ocean pattaya
review: Big noise all nights from outside construction Hotel request you deposit of 120 % of the complete stay. If you paid all by card  no refund possible and deposit was charged in your bank account after 3 Days

title: Outstanding Hotel.. most recommended !
review: Dear Mr. Marie,  Thank you for your review.  We are sorry to know that you were disappointed when you were asked to make a security deposit. As a standard practice in all international hotels, we ask for credit card pre-authorisations or cash deposits to cover accommodation and other incidental charges that might happen during your stay. The deposit amount will be returned within 2 weeks after you checked out. We do apologise for your inconvenience and hope that you will understand our policy.  I do sincerely apologise for the noise disturbance caused by the renovation works. However, we hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back again soon in a freshly new design of Amari Pattaya.   With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Best Hotel in Pattaya, Amazing Experience
review: Outstanding Hospitality ...MORE than what we expected... Dao at the reception was exceptional when it came to heeding to our requests while checking in ... she very very graciously upgraded one of our room's on our request to a Suite since we were here to celebrate a very special occasion the 50th B'day of our friend Commander Pawan. This was followed by a very touching display of affection from the hotel organised by Dao. A B'Day cake awaited us , to Wow us with wonderful celebration in our suite. We shall always remember this gesture... . ... Almost on the beach ... with a road separating the Hotel and the beach with all the good eating and recreational activities close by .. Owing to current  upgradation of Hotel facilities .. Myntra restaurant serving as a standby…

title: Great Stay
review: Excellent Hotel in North Pattaya. Great ocean view from the room. Very helpful staff. The breakfast buffet was great. I also liked the decor of the Mantra Restaurant. The best thing I saw at the breakfast buffet was how they served honey for Pancakes. I'll let explore that one yourself. Overall great experience.

title: Excellent
review: Dear AjayBansal20,  Thank you very much for your very positive feedback regarding your recent stay at Amari Pattaya. I am happy to learn that you enjoyed your stay and our buffet breakfast. We appreciate you recommending us to TripAdvisor community and look forward to your return for your next stay with us.   With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Alan lee
review: Excellent experience & enjoyed it during my stay & wish to visit again on my next trip tooWould recommend all my friends circle to avail best possible stayAll are intact & it was very convenient to approach the hotel

title: WONDERFUL HOSPITALITY @ AMARI OCEAN
review: First class hotel superb facilities in a great location seafront location views from the rooms are fantastic breakfast first class ,close to all the action that Pattaya has to offer Tiffanys lady boy show close by

title: Nice view of beach from this hotel
review: Dear Alan,  It was wonderful to be able to read your very positive feedback on your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya. I am happy to learn that you found the hotel in a good location and have enjoyed the selection and variety on our buffet breakfast.   We look forward to become your favourite choice of hotel when visiting Pattaya again next time.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: A great hotel
review: It’s a great place to stay the staff was very accommodating. The cleanliness, the food and the service were great. We would love to visit it again when we go to pattaya. It’s a great place to stay calm and near the beach and the market.

title: Nice hotel good location
review: Comfortable and large rooms with nice view from the balconyGood location on the sea front. Good transportation options nearby.Helpful staff. We needed transportation back to Bangkok and the desk personnel arranged everything at a normal price.

title: I love this hotel
review: I’ve stayed at Amari Pattaya more than 30 times in the past 8 or so years and it’s my favorite Hotel. From the moment you step into the hotel all the staff are incredibly friendly and welcoming and make you feel relaxed and on holiday.The hotel has been under renovation for the past year and a half but is almost complete and the new lobby and new rooms are exceptionally good. The location is perfect in my opinion as it’s on the beach, with the newly upgraded beach cleanup program just complete meaning the beach is literally at the front doorstep of the hotel, with just the beach Road to cross over.The hotel is located on the start of the Beach Road, away from the noisy night life so you can have silence in the evenings but just a 10baht tuk-tuk ride, which comes past the hotel…

title: VERY POOR BEHAVIOR
review: Hotel Is Good, Location, Food, But Not Happy With Service, Very Rude Behavior From Manager, Need To More Polite And Respectful With The Customers Was Asked To Look For Another Hotel Else Everything Was Good

title: Great place if you have to spend time in Pattaya
review: Dear Mr. Murtuza,  Thank you for your review and for taking the time to bring your constructive observations to my attention.   We do offer once again our most sincere apologies for the noise disturbances from renovation works and for service and attitude of our team member. We have thoroughly investigated the issue and the relevant managers have taken immediate corrective actions. They will be retraining on some of our standards to prevent this from occurring again. We have been by no means our intention to ask our guest to leave the hotel. We do respect guest's decision if decide to cancel the rest of your stay due to the inconvenience from renovation noise. However, I was glad that our team were able to resolve the issue immediately by offering you a better room.  Mr. Murtuza, I do once again sincerely apologise and hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back to our hotel so we could show you the level of service usually upheld at our Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Bangkok Tour
review: This is our first international trip to Bangkok . Really our stay is awesome and especially my wife enjoys a lot.   All the staff are courteous, friendly and helpful. The location and Ocean view of the hotel was incredibly superb. The rooms are spacious neat and clean with beautiful bathroom.

title: Awesome
review: Dear hemanthk76,  Thank you very much for your positive review. I am happy to learn that you enjoyed your stay and liked your room. Thank you also for your valuable and encouraging comments regarding our team members. I will be more than happy to share your comments with our entire team.  We look forward to welcoming you and your wife back whenever you decide to visit Pattaya again in the near future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Not a 5star at preesent
review: The new entrance is stunning and was nice and cool compared to the heat outside. reception staff were friendly and understood english well and were very helpful with my early checkin. laundry service was great, and the 4 items free per day was a great help. i enjoyed the matra breakfast each day as well and the friendly staff at the restaurant in the mornings.

title: Amari 2018
review: Dear brycemorgan2,  It is very nice to know that you enjoyed your stay at Amari Pattaya. Thank you for your valuable and encouraging comments regarding our team members. I will be more than happy to share your comments with our entire team.  We are excited to welcome you back to Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Experience in Amari ocean hotel
review: The staff is extremely friendly except the room cleaner. The Cleaner even managed to forget empty full ashtray at the Balcony for 2 days. Check in and check out was very fast and without hassle. I underestimate the impact of the ongoing construction. During the day you need to leave the room early to avoid the constant hammering and drilling. The Breakfast as is one of the best i had in the past 20 years traveling Asia in 5 star Hotels. Just excellent. You can taste that the chef is a Michelin Star Holder. The 4 stars given only reflects the current construction issue. If this is over i am sure this property will be again a real 5 star Hotel with fine Location at the Beach.

title: Very good customer services
review: Just left this have last week after stayed there for 3 nights. The hotel is located in a very convenience place of Pattaya. Nearby  beaches and large shopping centres.The room of this hotel is clean and spacious. All staff provided very good customer services to us.

title: AMARI OCEAN IS SUPERB
review: I always stay in Junior Suite Ocean View ...the newly furbished room is fantastic and very modern...yet maintaining traditional Thai culture  ..the room has a distinct appeal ..neat..clean..spacious.. sharp..&..lighting  very soothing....The all new lobby is vast and luxurious ...as always the staff is first class ...Thank You for making my stay comfortable..

title: Excellent overall stay, wonderful view
review: We had an amzing stay at Amari Pattaya at junior suite ocean view room. Exceptional panaromic view, large room, big bathroom with bath tub, balcony with sit out option... Breakfast options were good, it is served at a different building due to ongoing constructions, but the ambiance is great and a vehicle is available transfer from main building to the breakfast area. A lot of shopping and eating options available in walking distance.

title: Best value for money
review: Everything was perfect as 5 star hotel supposed to be.  The room was nice and clean with a comfy bed.  The all staff of hotel were amazing.  Great location.   Thank you, dear assistant FOM for your quick and very helpful response. You made this stay in Amari more wonderful :)  I have no doubt that I will return again!

title: Great Hotel, and superb location!
review: This is an outstanding Hotel, I recommend this hotel for family trip. The hotel is good and clean. Some floors are under renovation, and temporary kids club is too small. I hope that everything should be better when I visit this hotel again!

title: Family Trip
review: I am working in Thailand and many of my customers like to stay at Amari Ocean when they visit us. So I made decision to stay at Amari Ocean for my family trip. It was very nice to stay at Amari Ocean during my holiday with my family. Even thought there was some facility was under construction, I was impressed at staff's kindness and smile all the time. Also the cleanliness was very excellent. I would recommend if you plan business and family trip.

title: Another Great Visit
review: My Fav Hotel in Asia if not the Globe, they recognized it was my 70th stay and gave me, wine, fruit, cheese and a free dinner in the Mantra Restaurant. Staff always very friendly and attentive.  I come here as often as possible, the construction did not disturb me as its very much managed to cause min disruption to guests.

title: Amari ocean tower
review: Great hotel. If any problems arise ask for Pear as she sorts everything out, not that I had any. Works going on at the moment with noise all day but all acceptable if you listen to your music on earphones.

title: Exceptional hotel and service
review: Stayed here for Christmas and NY (2017). I've stayed in a few of the Amari hotels (Koh Samui, Phuket and Bangkok) and they are worth the money and guaranteed exceptional service.  The hotel was undergoing construction and we had an issue with the room we booked, which was quickly resolved and extremely happy with how they handled it and upgraded us. We had booked an Executive room with sea view and ended up with duplex suite - absolutely amazing. As we'd booked an Executive room, we had access to the Executive floor (only people staying in the Executive rooms had access to this floor) which had the benefit of its own restaurant and from 17:00 - 19:00 they had an exquisite buffet and any drinks you wished for to help yourself to. It was extremely lovely.   We ate breakfast in the…

title: Holidaying at Pattaya.
review: I never stayed at a first class hotel but staying at your Amari Ocean Pattaya was a great experience for me. The service provided by all staffs were excellent, helpful and friendly. Thanks for your friendly services.

title: In overall I am always happy to stay at Amari..
review: I like breakfast at Amari because there are variety of food and drinks. Especially, I love coffee Machine and noodle section.  I didn't have time to swim this time, so I hope to swim at the renovated pool next time I visit.  If the balcony's door is easy to lock, it would be perfect!

title: STRICTLY AVOID UNTIL RENOVATION IS OVER.
review: I did my booking thru makemytrip.com and they didnt warn me regarding renovation, that was really sad.  Amari tried to compensate by way of offering buggy service to go to the restaurant etc. but there is that experience of staying a 5 star property that was really missed. I felt that i was put up in a stand alone building property but i paid for a resort kind of property.  STRICTLY AVOID UNTIL RENOVATION IS OVER.

title: Terrible hotel
review: Dear rajsagarwal,  Thank you for posting your comments regarding your recent stay with us. I am sincerely sorry for any inconvenience caused from the renovation works during your visit. We have indicated on our Amari booking website and the websites of our Travel agent partners that our Amari Ocean Tower and its facilities are currently undergoing an overall refurbishment of all our rooms, public areas and pool facilities till December 2018. We did our utmost to ensure minimal disturbance to guest comfort and enjoyment. Please accept our apologies for this inconvenience.   I do hope that you will give us another chance and consider staying in our hotel again. We assure you that our renewed efforts will not leave you disappointed.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Stay @ AMARI PATTAYA
review: I don't understand why they keep this hotel open for customers while it is a construction site, aside from making money from people that don't know this.  The reception area is in the hallway which are entered through a back door, the gym is a hotel room, the breakfast is in a dinner restaurant next door and the rooms are overlooking a construction site which are noisy

title: Good but still in big renovation
review: Dear Stigjessen,  Thank you very much for your review. We do sincerely apologise for your disappointing experience caused from the construction during your visit. It has been by no means our intention to be misleading to our guests or our future potential customers and exactly for that reason we have indicated on our Amari booking website that our Amari Ocean Tower and its facilities are currently undergoing an overall refurbishment of all our rooms, public areas and pool facilities till December 2018.  We do hope that you will give us another chance and consider staying in our hotel again. We assure you that our renewed efforts will not leave you disappointed again.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Amari Pattaya
review: We stayed at the Amari Ocean for four days. This was the second time that we were staying there and as earlier, it was a pleasure. Even though the front portion was under renovation, it did not create any problems. The staff were always courteous and every willing to help. Overall an excellent time there and we will certainly stay there again

title: Pari
review: It's a nice hotel but not for this time. The room is nice and comfy but don't open the curtain, you will find construction view as the picture. It's not suppose to call "Ocean View" at all. You have to enter by the back door to check in at the 4rd floor with noisy from construction all the time. The swimming pool is not suit for swim because it's next to construction area with noisy sound, dusty and chemical smell sometimes. About fitness room made me disappointed because, they replaced the guess room with fitness center, small room and very warm, not proper to work out with this condition. About breakfast you have to go to another building to have breakfast which is actually not for breakfast, feel like you are in the lougne and drink wine, not coffee because the light is so…

title: Luxury stay
review: Dear GB P,  Thank you for posting your comments regarding your recent stay with us.   We do offer our most sincere apologies for the inconvenience during your visit which have been caused by refurbishment works and the construction of our new property, and that we have to relocate some of our facilities to temporary area. This is part of our continuous efforts to enhance guest experience. Every effort has been made to ensure minimal disturbance to guest comfort and enjoyment.  We do once again apologise for this disappointing experience and hope that you will give us another chance and consider staying in our hotel again. We assure you that our renewed efforts will not leave you disappointed.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: My Stay at Amari Pattaya
review: We recently stayed at the Amari Ocean on the corner of North road and Beach road Pattaya north. Our room was the Executive club suite ocean view. I cannot recommend this room more highly. From the moment you check in at the executive lounge on the 19th floor till the time they open the huge door into the suite you are in total luxury. The room is enormous and covers the whole end of the hotel with floor to ceiling windows looking out onto the bay of Thailand. These windows allow an almost 180 degree view of the bay. The room was well laid out with a separate kitchen with island bench , dining table , lounge room, desk area and a separate enormous bedroom with ample cupboard space, confortable bed, very large ensuite with a separate WC and a electric privacy screen if needed…

title: Compact Smart Star Hotel
review: Over all very good experience, hotel staffs was very courteous and humble. Breakfast variety of food was excellent (specially Indian and Veg food). Only downside we had experience was on going renovation work, due to which we hotel lobby area and SPA was inaccessible.

title: Amari Hotel Pattaya
review: The hotel has apparently went through recent renovations but I did not see much new since my last stay in 2017. The rooms are fairly spacious and I had a nice Ocean view. There is an excellent pool bar but the service can be slow at times. The beach is across the street but not a great beach but the hotel is central and for western food if you like there is a Hard Rock Café about 200 meters away. All in all a decent place but definitely not 5 star.

title: Enjoyable stay
review: My friend Sagar Nagpal, recently checked in at the hotel. He appreciated services provided by Jack and Kwan. Manutsanan, the supervisor, was warm and polite. Areeya at the front office was welcoming. Parinya, Surasak, Kallaya also made the short stay comfortable.

title: Nice hotel
review: Location was good. Excatly beach facing. Room size is very good. Staff is cooperative. Swimming pool was very nice. This hotel provide free pickup and drpd facility to the main Beach road. Front desk people were helpful.

title: dissappointed
review: We were  told about Renovations  not the planned power outage and this impacted our stay. I blame the management staffs for the 6 hours power outage , could have plan properly and info customer earlier during booking . Cheap way of cheating people i guess...The staff however are fantastic and made our stay reasonable. They went above and beyond

title: VALUE FOR MONEY
review: Dear Elengo,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your comments regarding your recent stay with us. Please accept our sincerest apologies that you had to experience a electricity problem during your stay.   We sincerely apologise for disappointing you and allowing you to go through a negative experience by not properly handling the problem due to an unexpected issue. Rest assured we have discussed with the concerned department heads for our team’s future improvements.   We really appreciate the information you have provided and do hope that you will reconsider staying with us and allow us to show you the level of service we usually uphold in Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Pure luxury
review: On arrival to our hotel we were greeted by door men who unloaded our bags and luggage from our taxi, brought us to the reception to be checked in. While we were waiting we were offered cold drinks and cold towels. When we finally checked in we noticed that they had a tourist desk for activities and so we bought a ticket off them for the Sriracha tiger zoo, which is cheaper than the ticket you’ll get at the door there.  The room: clean, spacious, well maintained, the view was spectacular, although there was building work commencing on the premises, there was no disturbance.   The breakfast: full range of American continental menu, which was tasty.  The staff was always polite.

title: Not informed about renovations.
review: Unfortunately we were not told about Renovations (only an email 1 day out from our trip) and this impacted our stay. Renovations are clearly needed.  The staff however are fantastic and made our stay reasonable. They went above and beyond.

title: Cox
review: Dear JemNick,  Thank you for posting your comments regarding your recent stay with us.   I am sincerely sorry for any inconvenience caused from the renovation works during your visit. We have indicated on our Amari booking website and the websites of our Travel agent partners that our Amari Ocean Tower and its facilities are currently undergoing an overall refurbishment of all our rooms, public areas and pool facilities till December 2018. In fact our team sent another email direct to our guests to ensure that all guests will not miss posted renovation notice from the agents and receive information prior to arrival.  However I am glad that our team members did their best to fulfill your requirements and exceeded your expectation. I will share your comments with the team.  I do hope that you will give us another chance and consider staying in our hotel again. We assure you that our renewed efforts will not leave you disappointed.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Fabulous
review: 1.Deluxe ocean view king all I seen was construction site little bit view at the end of Eye Conner paid $150 for this room wanna change room but other room was worse than this one (next to remodeled) ! 2. Refrigerator wasn’t working not one but two I gave up! 3. Washed my hair only shampoo bc this hotel wasn’t provided conditioner picture showed result (hair tangled/hair lost)

title: Back to the usual high service
review: Dear kingkaelsaepuc,  Thank you for sharing your experience regarding your recent stay with us.   We are sorry to read that your room did not live up to your expectations and that there was refrigerator problem in your room. We appreciate the information we have received from you and sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. Rest assured we have taken immediate actions to rectify all issues and prevent any re-occurrence.  We hope that you will consider staying with us again on your next visit to Pattaya. We will do our utmost to make your stay more memorable than your recent visit.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Hotel stay
review: We told the hotel that it was our wedding anniversary, and asked for special room upgrade , our wishes were fulfilled , our room bed was decorated with flower petals  depicting two hearts also the bath tub was decorated and filled with foam and flower petals , my wife was truly delighted by these touches done by the amari staff , we have been using the amari ocean tower for many years on our visits to Pattaya and always have had good stays there and would recommend this hotel to anyone as one of the best places to stay in Pattaya ,

title: Good experience at amari
review: Dear Tony,  Thank your very much for taking the time to post your positive feedback on your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya. I was pleased to read that you and your wife had a wonderful time for your wedding anniversary. Even more your compliments on our team’s friendliness and service ability are a great encouragement to them.  We appreciate you recommending us and look forward to welcoming you back to your home at Amari Pattaya in the near future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: My stay in Pattaya
review: Great location and services but check-in process is quite slow.   Fully facilities in deluxe room. Room is big and comfortable. Price is reasonable when compare with other hotels.   Nice experience with Amari Pattaya!

title: 5* pricelevel but 3* servicelevel
review: Dear Starter B,  Thank you very much for your positive feedback regarding your recent stay at Amari Pattaya. I am happy to learn that you found the hotel in a good location and have enjoyed your room. However, I do apologise for any inconvenience caused due to slow check in process. Rest assured, I will discuss your comments with our Front Office Manager for improvement.  We look forward to your return to Amari Pattaya in the near future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Great hotel
review: I don't have the words to describe it it was awesome. Everything was in order staff was very courteous. Surroundings was good location was excellent they provided us the superior room children enjoy it very much in the pool as well as in Kids Zone

title: Great Hotel for Business Trip
review: Conveinent to beach and all city attractions. Would stay here again. Hotel was undergoing rennovations but was still in top shape. Very nice and spacious room. Daily breakfast was included in my rate, many choices.

title: LOVELY STAY
review: Our visit commenced with a lovely welcome from Nida.  Quick access to a very spacious room (always very well looked after by our maids).  This hotel is in a great location - probably the best part of town to be staying at (especially with the opening this year of Terminal 21 shopping mall which is on the hotels doorstep).  Easy access to the beach and to the main hub of Pattaya.  All staff are well trained, efficient and hospitable including the security guards who are most helpful and pleasant to chat with.  There are plenty of sunbeds available with a choice of sun or shade along with a great bunch of guys to take care of you under the supervision of Surasak.  Internet was excellent throughout our stay especially for the business guest.  The hotel is undergoing renovation but…

title: nice staff
review: every staff are really nice room is nice and renovated room look much better than old one don't worry much about construction because i don't feel any uncomfortable or inconvenience during stay, they manage quite well to ensure guess has a pleasant stay

title: Wonderful Hospitality!
review: Dear Aunpunch,  It was wonderful to read your positive feedback on your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya. I am pleased to hear that overall you have enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to your return to Pattaya and would love to welcome you back to your Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Misleading Room Titles
review: Wonderful service and hospitality by the hotel staff! Rooms are very cozy. People are very warm and helpful. The right place to go when you are with your family. The hotel was going through renovation and the right gesture of informing customers during the booking is much appreciated!

title: Leisure
review: Awesome property, very friendly staff, very helpful. Suit room I stayed is sea facing , it was beautiful to watch the sea in the morning as well during the sun set .Value for money , accommodative for early check, I would highly recommend for a family as well for stags  Excellent food . Very nice pool.

title: Super stay with family
review: Visited the hotel in my May with family had a super time. Service was good, breakfast was excellent serving Indian food. Hotel staff was polite and helpul. This all comes with good location and nice view from the suite room.

title: Friendly hotel
review: The staff are all friendly but Convenience store is distant and uncomfortable. Room condition is good. Seaview was a bit disappointed because it was a deluxe room. Breakfast quality was average, but scrambled was delicious.

title: Good location
review: If you're looking for quiet holidays this place definitely suitable for you but if you prefer more vibrant and happening area this won't be fit to your needs. We love the nice ambient and cleanliness of the room and hotels except each day we needs to climb high hills to enter main entrance of hotel due to renovation which rather tiring. Overall quite nice place to stay in.

title: Experience at Amari Ocean
review: Dear Marcusteoh212,  Thank you for kind feedback regarding your recent stay at Amari Pattaya. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your room and the hotel location.   I do however sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused by the renovation of the hotel entrance and lobby. We hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back again soon in a freshly new design of Amari Pattaya.   With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Office conference come leasure trip
review: Not a value for money stay other than the prime location and i was lucky to have a junior suit with sea view. Buffet food choice is very less other than pork and chicken no option for fish. Vegetables and other foods are also very less in number of choice. Nice room but not maintained well (although they are working on it). My toilet curtain was spoiled can't replaced in 2 days of my stay. Room service also very poor. I have spent 4 nights in Amari Bangkok(superb in all aspect) and came here with lots of hope and feel cheated. Whereas they are charging more than Bangkok but service is far behind. You have enough choice within thia location why to pay extra money for this poor service.

title: Great place to stay with family!
review: Dear Soumen G,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us the feedback on your recent stay. We do sincerely apologise for that your overall experience did not live up to your expectation. We have discussed your concerns with our respective department heads who will re-train our staff our standards to prevent re-occurrence. Our service focus is that we not only need to meet each and every guest's expectations, but should try our utmost to always exceed these. Unfortunately during your stay we have failed to achieve this objective.  We really appreciate the information you have provided and do hope that you will reconsider staying with us and allow us to show you the level of service we usually uphold in Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: The best or nothing
review: We stayed at junior suite and the overall stay was fantastic. No indoor games Options, may be an area of improvement. The breakfast and overall. Ambience is great.. Lot of staff (almost everyone) seems to be happy for your visit and keeps greeting. Lot of Indian food joints around the hotel and serving really good Quality food. Especially for veg lovers it is worth trying 'CHOTIWALA' restaurant and for Non-vegetarian you should try 'WAH JI WAH' restaurant. Lot of places to visit for Kids and is very safe to travel with kids and family.

title: Good property, Great location, Would be much better after ongoing renovation of Ocean Wing
review: The Hotel Amari Pattaya is the first addresses for an comfortable stay at your Business trip around Pattaya. I could feel like at home after an stressfully Business day. All staffs are friendly and helpful. Let’s say thank you to all staffs on this way for the obliging and cooperative way for male the stay unforgettable.

title: WARNING!!!!!   HOTEL STAFF WILL STEAL PERSONAL ITEMS!
review: Main Entrance and Lobby are being extensively renovated, so temporary lobby and check in  is in the Ocean Tower wing 4th floor, but to say the least, they are managing the makeshift arrangements superbly to avoid any inconveniences to the guests. The Deluxe Ocean view room is super spacious and with panoramic floor to ceiling window offering great view. Great breakfast. Pool is not too great as of now because of its proximity to the renovation areas but all renovations will be completed by 31DEC 2018 as per the staff. All staff can communicate in English and are extremely helpful.

title: Outstanding service with a beautiful Thai smile.
review: Yes, there is a building site next door for improvements of Amari, yes there is a little noise but this is all cordoned off with high 5 metre camouflaged backdrops so you still get the ambience of the beautiful and comfortable pool area. Yes it’s a slight inconvenience but Amari have reflected this within their pricing structure at present.  Check in was excellent, a soothing cold flannel and cold herb drink with that hospitable Thai welcome. We arrived a little early (11am) but staff bent over backwards to get us into our room by 1pm so our luggage was kept safe and well whilst we took a nice space around the pool. We went to our room at 1.30pm and was welcomed by a spacious, clean and modern open-plan type room, with a fully stocked mini-bar, large bath, large flat screen Tv,…

title: Pleasant Trip
review: Nice Hotel in a good area. Expansion and renovation of the hotel going on without any disturbance to guests, lobby still not ready however a makeshift entrance up a slope makes one pant at times. Breakfast was good .

title: Amari Ocean Best Beach Hotel in Pattaya
review: We were very grateful to get Ste. 400 offering the breath taking view of the ocean . Located on the quiet end of beach road.. A blue taxi ride on beach road for 10 bahts (30 cents) can take you to the opposite end where lies the famous Walking Street.. The hotel room extra spacious with an oversized king bed and an island type oversized bathtub made for 2, double sinks and a separate shower.. Breakfast was first class buffet offering worldwide selection along with your own freshly prepared omlette.. Swimming pool very nice layout with open bar and food. The Staff were always helpful from a personal ride to the parking lot, helping with our luggage, cleaning the room and always attentive to our needs.

title: Outstanding experience
review: Dear Starsshines4US,  It was wonderful to read your positive feedback on your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya. I am pleased to hear that overall you have enjoyed your stay with us. I am delighted that our service provided during your stay has exceeded your expectations.  We look forward to welcoming you back to your home at Amari Pattaya in the near future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: My Stay experience at Amari pattaya ..
review: The place was clean and well maintained. They were all friendly and accomodating. Though wifi needs to be fixed as it gets slow during night time. Overall, great place to stay, will certainly come back.

title: Pattaya Vacation at Amari
review: We stayed at Amari Ocean while we were in Pattaya. Hotel staff was extremely polite and courteous. Facilities at the hotel very good. Best was part was the kids room. Our children enjoyed fun activities at the kids room. Location of the hotel is amazing. Its right next to the beach.

title: Good spot out of the hustle and bustle
review: We stayed at the Amari Ocean from March 6 to March 10, 2018.   The hotel in undergoing extensive renovation and whilst there is some noise and minor inconvenience we found it quite tolerable.   The rooms are spacious and clean, the only criticism we have was that the pillows in the room were very soft - hardly a show stopper.   The staff were very friendly and generally spoke English well enough that we could easily communicate.    A special call out to Buchar and Parinya at the pool bar who researched how to make whisky sours for my husband and did a great job.   All in all a good spot and out of the busier areas of Pattaya.   Highly recommend this place.

title: Great location and room!
review: Dear Brett D,  It was wonderful to be able to read your positive feedback on your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya. Thank you very much for your encouraging comments regarding Khun Bunchar and Khun Parinya. I am delighted to know you found our staff was doing their utmost to respond to your needs and fulfilled your expectations in a friendly manner.   Thank you also for recommending us to the Tripadvisor community. We look forward to become your favourite choice of hotel when visiting Pattaya again next time.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Amari Ocean Pattaya is Good
review: We were allocated to a room with a tree view at first, so we spoke to the front desk and ask for a new room. We were then moved to a ocean view room which was excellent in view. The queen size bed was too comfortable and the swimming pool was large enough with a bar. Enjoyed our stay there!

title: Good staff, good location and breakfast,
