review: Very good place and location. convenient with friendly staff. Nothing to complain. Clean and tidy place as well despite having renovation. Security guards are friendly. everybody is friendly! Will be back there again!

title: Beautiful view; Courteous staff
review: What can I say about this place? Localed along the beach, Amari Property is right besides Holiday Inn and Dusit Thani. Placed right in the centre of the city, the Hard Rock Cafe, View Point, Sanctuary of truth and other places are very much approachable from here. The rooms are spick n span. The staff is courteous and the breakfast spread is quite nice. Enjoy their swimming pool and spa.

title: Faultless
review: Great location, probably the nicest part of town to be staying in. Our room was a 2 level loft, spacious for the 3 of us, well decorated and comfortable. The rate was also much more attractive than the other hotels of the same standard, and I think the location and the room size here is even better. I highly recommend Amari for anyone looking for a luxury stay in Pattaya.

title: Excellent property
review: Dear Trevostar,  Thank you very much for your review. I am pleased to know you enjoyed your Duplex suite. We appreciate you recommending us and look forward to your return for your next stay with us in the near future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Amazing
review: Overall a good experience. Has good and spacious family rooms as well on offer. Decent breakfast spread. Staff need to be trained on giving some documentation to guests while cancelling the deposit amounts.

title: A perfect luxury holiday
review: Fantastic holiday, hotel was beautiful and the hotel staff went above and beyond to make our stay special. Will definitely stay here again. Plenty of things to see and do in Pattaya. Not really for children but great for adults.

title: Please Ignore All Negative Reviews....We Loved it
review: We were 3 couples....Early checkin provided with ease....The rooms in Ocean Towers are large n Spacious...very clean with Sea View...we were on 17th floor....The staff is Suoerb n very friendly....The Location is awesome....very reasonable tuk to tuk market n Walking Street.....The Breakfast is well spread.....Everything was fine...stayed 26.02 to 1.03....Will surely come back again.....Keep it up Amari.....We are now at Amari Koh Samui....Another Awesome property.....Loving it....

title: Ocean view
review: Dear Palimakar,  It is wonderful to receive your positive feedback and we thank you for taking the time to share us your review. I was pleased to read that you enjoyed all aspects of your stay with us. We highly appreciate you recommending us and that you would return to stay at Amari Pattaya again in the future.  We look forward to welcoming you back and wish you an enjoyable holiday at our Amari Koh Samui.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Pattaya for 3 nights
review: Nice view on the ocean , but very bad service and food taste. Unsecured access to the restaurant in the tower with two entrance on the main street road so you cant leave your laptop for a second. With weak internet segnal in the rooms.

title: Amari Pattaya Bangkok
review: Dear Emad,  Thank you for sharing your experience regarding your recent stay with us. We are sorry to read that your experience did not live up to your expectations. If we had been informed of the situation during your stay we would certainly have resolved the issues and offered you some alternative options. Please accept our sincere apologies.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit to Pattaya and will do our utmost to make your stay even more memorable than your first visit.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Great staff.
review: We had a prolonged weekend stay at the Amari Pattaya. My main aim, was to go to Mantra for the Sunday Brunch, where I have been going many times before, when I lived and worked in this beach town. It still is a good value for money. We were not offered the wine buffet though, so I am not sure, whether this still exists.

title: Pro Hacker Event, bubbles.
review: Major construction ongoing with Garden wing, but Ocean kept its high standards. Room very spacious, clean and modern. Service throughout hotel and facilities first class. Check and out very quick with capable staff. All round a fantastic stay

title: Very good staff - the building is a problem though.
review: Firstly I must say the staff in every department are of a very high standard - they try very hard to take good care of guests. The hotel do warn of ‘Renovations’ when you book. Strictly speaking the Ocean wing is being renovated and sometimes it can be noisy during the day, never a problem at night. What they don’t mention is most of the grounds are taken over by a new major construction. They are building a new high rise wing and a second Hotel just a few metres away from the swimming pool. It’s very noisy during the day. I would suggest this will be ongoing for the next year or more. Consequently the swimming pool area  is very noisy and not quite as clean and dust free as it should be. If you want a quiet break this is probably not the best hotel to choose. Be aware though…

title: Unwanted visitors
review: Dear Mark,  Thank you very much for your detailed review. We do offer our most sincere apologies for any inconvenience caused from the construction during your visit and for the negative experience you had encountered due to other guests. I have shared your review with our Executive Chef and the team to be more aware of this issue and ensure that our hygiene standards are in place.  I am however delighted that our staff has been able to deliver a high level of service and are doing their utmost to exceed your expectations. We do hope that you will give us another chance and consider staying in our hotel again should you return to Pattaya. If this is possible, I would be delighted to make all the necessary arrangements to ensure that you will have a relaxing stay as should be expected from Amari Hotels.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Noise - and not even from the building
review: We are frequent visitors from Amari, but this year it was no good. There is a construction goiing on on their terrain with a lot of noice. Avoid now the swimmingpool area during the day. Breakfast was not as it was. And last but not least. We had three nights with cockroaches, they should improve their pestcontrol

title: Stay like at home
review: Dear Lykele D,  First of all, thank you very much for taking the time to share with us your comments. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience due noise disturbance from the hotel construction.  In regards to your comment about the cockroaches, I do apologise once again about this and have taken immediate actions to rectify this problem. We also have a pest control conducted regularly to minimise the impact of all pests and insects. I have shared your comment to respective department head for further investigation and improvement.  We really appreciate the information you have provided and do hope that you will reconsider staying with us again in the near future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Great Stay
review: I stayed two night of Amari  Pattaya. My room was  Ocean Tower at Room 2020 with Duplex Suites room which provided spacious space 2 floors with living room and master bedroom on separate floors. This type of rooms can stay up to 3 pax with extra bed and provide many complimentary snack and cereal.  I love the swimming pool and fitness. Breakfast was great. Concierge staff is helpful. I definitely stay at Amari Orchid again next time

title: Good hospitality and nice views
review: Dear litafer,  Thank you for taking the time to post your positive feedback on your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya. I was pleased to read that overall you had a comfortable stay and found the breakfast was great. Even more your compliments on our team’s friendliness and service ability are a great encouragement to them.  We look forward to become your favourite choice of hotel when visiting Pattaya again next time.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Great blend of Location & Luxury at reasonable prices.
review: In my views their is lack of hospitality in Thailand hotels but this hotel was quiet good with good staff and superb location. My room had a spectacular view of ocean and city. Food was also good.Overall a good experience

title: Not such a great experience this tme
review: We stayed in Holiday inn next door next three days due to constraints with booking by our Indian travel agent. The difference in level of Luxury & Price was instantly visible. Rooms were small and so were bathroom.

title: Amari Pattaya Dec last week 2017 !
review: Last stayed here 2 years ago and had a great time. Came back this year for Christmas and New Year. Booked direct with the hotel. Hotel informed us that there was refurbishment ongoing and that some facilities would be curtailed. However the spa would remain open. Booked transportation with the hotel and pick was excellent and a comfortable ride to the hotel. On arrival we noticed that the Amari garden wing had been demolished and was now a construction site. The sports bar at the front of the hotel had also been demolished. Hotel was surrounded by hoarding. Checked in at the Horizon club. On looking out the window saw the amount of work ongoing on the site. I would class this as major construction NOT refurbishment as they are now laying the founds for a 15 storey extension. The…

title: Service is top class, but wait for the renovations
review: Great hotel. It's been around a long time, but the actual hotel has been completely renovated and modernized. Rooms are great. Lots of open area and space. Maybe not ideal for families with small kids, but great for couples. The management have done their best to accommodate their guests and provide access to all facilities during their external renovations, which are being undergone at the moment. Service is really 1st class. All staff are friendly and attentive. Hotel facilities are good. Will be interesting to see how everything looks once the outside renovations are completed. Looks like it will be really spectacular.

title: Under Renovation, ocean facing rooms has side view of sea at 45 degree
review: Dear C8539FCbretts,  Thanks for taking the time to post your positive feedback on your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya. I was pleased to read that overall you had a comfortable stay and found the service was great. Your compliments on our team’s friendliness and service ability are a great encouragement to them.  We look forward to your next visit and would love to welcome you back to again soon in a freshly new design of Amari Pattaya.   With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Perfect!
review: The Hotel is under renovation with make shift lobby, kids room and other facilities severely limited. The entrance is obnoxious and Ocean View Room hardly have a ocean view.                               Avoid at least till renovation is complete. zero on value for money

title: Excellent holiday with perfectem service
review: Dear Sandeep,  Thank you very much for your review. We do offer our most sincere apologies for any inconvenience caused from the construction during your visit.    Your comments are important and have been noted, allowing us to take action and make improvements. We appreciate the information we received from you and apologise for any inconveniences caused. Please rest assured that we always do our utmost to deliver all guests the best service, despite the time of this on-going renovation.  We do hope that you will give us another chance and consider staying in our hotel again. We assure you that our renewed efforts will not leave you disappointed again. If this is possible, I would be delighted to make all the necessary arrangements to ensure that you will have a relaxing stay as should be expected from Amari Hotels.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Best in class-location, service and food rocks
review: Really nice hotel to stay, 5 stars no complaint at all. Great room wih full amenities, the bed is so comfortable, breakfast is awesome! They even serve vegetarian for Indians. Walking distance to all the attractions and night life.   It is under renovation, it didnt botter us much tho. They are extending the pool area as well. So next year will looks better I’m looking forward.  The concierge helped to arrange transfer to the bus terminal with a minimal fees, staffs are extremely polite.

title: Quality and service found degrade
review: I here in Amari Ocean for 5th time. Last I visited amari ocean pattaya in may 2016. But this time surprisingly the quality and services found degrade from before. Also some portion of the hotel found under renovation which they not informed us before so it's very inconvenient. Also maintainance issue found in the room and property which is unattended. However overall experience of property not found as before.

title: suitable for business and corporates
review: Dear Hemal,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay. We are sorry to read that your experience did not live up to your expectations. We do sincerely apologise for the inconvenience caused by the construction. Rest assured we will take immediate actions to ensure that proper service is rectified. Also every effort have been made to ensure minimal disturbance to guest comfort and enjoyment.   We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit to Pattaya and would be delighted if you would allow us to show you the level of service usually upheld at our Amari Pattaya. We will do utmost to make your stay even more memorable than your recent visit.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Good hotel
review: we were for two nights, the rooms were little cozy,  front desk people and service were helpful.  breakfast was ok-ish, can be lot better with more continental.  this hotel is more suitable for business purposes.

title: Wonderful stay
review: Basically the hotel has better performance than its cost.  Especially high quality on the bed promises good sleeping.  However I would like you to improve the quality for Japanese food on the breakfast.  It was happy to find Japanese food but the 'dashi' which is one of the most important to feel good or not good is not good.  Not good means that every Japanese tourist easily knows the food is not cooked or checked by Japanese chef.  We easily understand there are something different from what we always eat in Japan.

title: Amari Ocean Pattaya - Dec 2017 (Renovation in progress)
review: Dear shuhok,  I was pleased to read your kind comments regarding your recent stay at Amari Pattaya.  Thank you for your constructive comments regarding the Japanese selection on our breakfast buffet. I will ensure to share your comments with our Executive Chef for further improvement.  We look forward to your next visit to Pattaya and would love to welcome you back to our Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: In the lap of luxury with a view to kill!
review: It was our second trip to Thailand and we had booked for three days at the Amari Oceanview Pattaya for a cozy relaxing time.  The resort is located at the start of North beach and was pretty easy to locate coming from Bangkok.   Our room on the 15th floor had a massive glass vista opening out to the North Pattaya Bay. The view is breathtaking from out there with a healthy sprinkling of liners and yachts.  For the day of our anniversary, we were upgraded to an executive suite in the exclusive 19th floor, with its own seating and dining areas along with a functional kitchen.  We spent the evening enjoying a 7-course fine Asian menu paired with wines at the Mantra restaurant at the southern end of the property.   If you crave for Indian food in Pattaya, Mantra has an exclusive…

title: rocking
review: nice hotel you can go for sea view room its an awesome experience but there are less options for indian breakfast so you have to go for fruits and breads only .Rest everything is too good I can say must experience amari once you go to pataya

title: Poor value for money
review: Dear 976rakeshs,  It is very encouraging to read your positive feedback and to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us at our Amari Pattaya. We really appreciate you recommending us to Trip Advisor community and look forward to your return to Amari Pattaya in the near future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Trip to Pattaya
review: Rooms are small compared to other adjoining hotels. Due to ongoing construction there is too much noise. Breakfast is terrible. Location of the hotel is good. Thankful to Mr Anuvrat the Guest manager who changed my room and upgraded also.

title: Your typical good 5 stars hotel
review: Dear sanjiv313,  I appreciate the kind feedback you have provided and thank you for staying with us at Amari Pattaya. I am sincerely sorry that you had some issues with the size of our room and the construction noise. However I was glad that Khun Anuwat was able to manage and resolve this issue immediately.   We sincerely hope that we will have another opportunity to welcome you back in our property in not so distant future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: LOVELY VACATION
review: Once again we enjoyed a lovely relaxing vacation at the Amari.  We received a lovely warm welcome from the girls on the 4th and 19th floor.  Check in was quick and professional and we were in our room with luggage arrival within 10 minutes. Also a very special mention to the lovely Nida who welcomed us with genuine warmth. This hotel is undergoing renovations which did not disturb us at all as the hotel does its absolute best to minimise any disturbance to guests - well done.  Our room was great and was well looked after by the lovely Amorn.  Breakfast was enjoyable with excellent staff - lovely welcome every morning and every staff member on the 3rd floor deserves a thank you for taking such good care of us.  Fantastic service from Sunny who genuinely cares for his guests - the…

title: Fabulous
review: It was an excellent experience of hospitality topped with comfort. Stayed 3 nights, staff was very welcoming and always willing to answer any call immediately. It was an amazing experience and I would surely want to revisit.

title: Always good experince with Amari
review: Dear KashifJavedRajput,  Thank you for taking your valuable time to review your stay with us. I really appreciate your positive feedback about our hotel and am very glad to read that you had a fantastic experience at Amari Pattaya that you enjoyed it truly.  We are excited to welcome you back during your next visit to Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Good service mind for all (reception, restaurant, security guard) Clean and quiet room A lot of choices for food (breakfast) Location is very good (close to the beach and others restaurants around the hotel)

title: Very amazing hotel
review: Dear punnarats2017,  It was wonderful to be able to read your positive feedback on your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya. I am delighted to know you found our staff was doing their utmost to respond to your needs and fulfilled your expectations in a friendly manner. Thank you for recommending us to the Tripadvisor community.  We look forward to your next visit and would love to welcome you back to your Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Amari Survey
review: Overpriced taking into consideration that there is a construction site in progress when looking out of the room window, which can also be disturbing on a morning as the piling can be heard. Resolution of electrical faults need to improve as in one case the electric went off in the morning and was off till mid afternoon

title: Nice hotel
review: Dear Gary,  First of all, thank you very much for taking the time to share with us your comments. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience due the hotel's annual preventive maintenance of our power distribution system and that therefore has affected the electricity cut off for a certain period of time. However we did our utmost to inform our guests in advance and ensured the generator use for all essential parts and emergency lighting as well as the hotel lifts.  We do once again apologise for this disappointing experience. We do hope that you will give us another chance and consider staying in our hotel again should you return to Pattaya. If this is possible, I would be delighted to make all the necessary arrangements to ensure that you will have a relaxing stay as should be expected from Amari Hotels.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Nice foods and facilities
review: Overall a nice hotel . I was allowed early check-in and got free upgrade. Staff was very helpful and eager to help at reception. My kids enjoyed Kids club and staff was amazing and respectful. Staff at 3rd floor was not willing to help and they were making faces when asked for milk (takeaway).  But I really liked the hotel

title: Amari experience
review: Dear Manish,  It was wonderful to be able to read your positive feedback on your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya. I am delighted to know you found our staff was doing their utmost to respond to your needs and fulfilled your expectations in a friendly manner. However I am sorry about the service at Essence restaurant, rest assured that we will discuss this with our Manager and re-train our team members. Please accept our apologies for this negative experience.  We look forward to your next visit to Pattaya and would love to welcome you back to our Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Great Weekend Getaway for Golf and Relaxation
review: Breakfast are nice and tasty. Swimming pools are good, safe for kids and quite clean. Travel to walking street of Pattaya is easy with tuktuk and quite cheap. However, beach side is dirty and not easy to get to. Perhaps due to current construction so the walk to beach is extended. Room and bathroom are nice, viewing to beach is good to see the sunrise

title: Excellent hotel with supreme views!
review: We stayed for 2 nights, for our honeymoon, at Amari Ocean Pattaya and everything about our stay was awesome! The hotel did mention that there some renovation happening but we hardly heard any noise during our stay.   We had booked a Junior Suite Ocean View room directly from Amari's website.  Check-in: Smooth, hassle free and prompt. As we were arriving quite early (our flight landed in BKK at 5:55 AM and we reached the hotel by around 9:00 AM) and hence had requested for early check-in. But all the rooms were full and hence we could not check in to our room yet. The staff, however, gave us access to a room to freshen up and head out to beach as we planned and once we got back our room was ready.   Stay: Everything about the room was awesome. Be it the comfort of the beds and…

title: One of the best Hotel I have ever stayed
review: Located just at the sea shore, nicely connected to the visiting places. Highly spacious room with ultra modern facilities and bathroom. Very well-mannered and jovial staffs. You will get a lot of options for food in breakfast, it is indeed a treat to have breakfast at Amari Ocean.One can book this hotel with out a second thought.  Only issue I face was that they had huge TV in rooms , but the quality of broadcast is very poor. So, if you can't survive without a TV, then do check with them before book if they have improved the channels subscription package or not.

title: So Good
review: I have a very lovely stayed there. I got very nice and clean room. All of team member are very polite and kind. Warm welcome since checked in. The pool was beautiful and huge. Definitely will go back again!

title: Very Good
review: Dear Khun Rujira,  It is very nice to know that you enjoyed your stay at Amari Pattaya and that you have had a wonderful time with us. Thank you for your valuable and encouraging comments regarding our team members. I will be more than happy to share your comments with our entire team.  We look forward to become your favourite choice of hotel when visiting Pattaya again next time.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: loved the property
review: This is a very good Hotel, in the time I was into I dit not have a Problems, all fast perfectly. The Staff is competent and frindly,all! My Room, Junior Suite has a perfekt view over Pattaya Beach. You can enjoy the Sun by coming up and when she go down. Wow!  All times again in this Hotel!

title: Good family trip
review: We were very disappointed to see the hotel construction when we arrived at first, but there wasn't much noise and the service was great! Hotel staff members are all very kind! The hotel is very close to the shopping area.

title: Wonderful service!!!
review: Dear youngseoks689,  I appreciate the kind feedback you have provided and thank you for staying with us at Amari Pattaya. I do sincerely apologise that your arrival experience did not live up to your expectation but I was glad that our team members were able to manage and have done their best to deliver a high level of service which exceeded your expectations.   We look forward to your next visit and would love to welcome you back to your Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: A great stay
review: I was well impressed for the service and room upgrade during my stay. Initially I did request for Junior Suite Ocean View via reservation but unit was fully utilized and left with just the Junior Suite. But upon arrival they upgraded me to the duplex unit and was grateful. May suggest to include some halal friendly dishes in the in-room dining menu. It was a pleasant stay nevertheless.

title: Wounderful stay
review: Dear Azaharin,  I was pleased to read your kind comments regarding your recent stay at Amari Pattaya and to learn that you were impressed with our service. Thank you for your constructive comments regarding the halal selection on our in-room dining menu. I will ensure to share your comments with our Executive Chef for further improvement.  We look forward to your next visit and would love to welcome you back to your Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Great Hotel
review: In spite of the ongoing construction next to the hotel, the stay was excellent. I recommend the executive floor which gives access to the lounge. A great view towards the north. The lounge was quiet, a relaxed atmosphere and ideal to do a bit or work after breakfast. The breakfast is excellent with a great variety of food and drinks. In the late afternoon they offer snacks and drinks, again a good choice of food and drinks including various different red and white wines. The staff are very polite, helpful and efficient and they do thei job with the always present Thai-smile. The room is of a good size, very functional with all what it needs for a pleasant and relaxing stay.  The Swimming pool is of a good size and they succeeded to have a pleasant atmosphere in spite of the…

title: Fantastic service, but construction is disturbing.
review: Every single one of their staff offers fantastic service.  Spa was also good. However, the construction was really loud by the swimming pool.  I was expecting to have a relaxing weekend doing nothing by the swimming pool (probably falling asleep on the chair), but it was not relaxing with all the noise.  I believe the hotel rate reflected the fact that the construction was going on, but I did not realize how loud all the noise from drilling, hammering, etc. could be.  They are not building anything as of October 15, they were working on the groundwork, so you will hear a lot of drilling and hammering noise. I would definitely stay at Amari Ocean again, after all the construction is done.

title: MEMORABLE MEMORIES
review: Dear momwith4kids,  Thank you for kind feedback regarding your recent stay at Amari Pattaya and for your encouraging comments about the hospitality of our team members. We do however sincerely apologised for the noise disturbance during your stay with us due to the renovation works.   We are looking forward to the opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit to Pattaya and will do our utmost to make your stay more memorable than your recent one.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Travel
review: We have had the best of memories to carry back home . The staff is courteous attentive and welcoming.The hotel is under renovation but still we enjoyed our stay . The location is the best and the sea facing junior suites offer a breathtaking view of the ocean . The Horizon club offers the best evening snacks and drinks .

title: Vacay in Pattaya!
review: Dear Mr. Sabharwal,  It is a great pleasure to receive your kind feedback regarding your recent stay at Amari Pattaya. I am glad to know that our team members were able to deliver the service which has always met your expectations.  We look forward to welcoming your back to your "home" in Pattaya in the near future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice President and Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Refurbishment ? or Major Construction Site ?
review: The best hotel!!!  Very kind, helpful, smart staff. They was taking care of me very good!!! Thanks a lot, guys! I appreciate it a lot! Highly recommended!!! I ll advise Amari Ocean to everyone!!! Good job! Kapunkap.

title: Amari our home from home experience
review: There are major building construction works going on at present, but if you can see past this current situation and choose to stay at the Amari you won't be disappointed.  The staff are the very best, food and beverages excellent and rooms comfortable and clean.  We have been staying here for the past ten years and have never had cause to complain.  It's a true home from home experience.

title: Up coming visit
review: We have been coming to this hotel for many years and have always found it amazing. Management and staff alike.  Reading some of the reviews regarding the noise from on going work worries me a bit, but in saying that to upgrade and make it a better hotel then we are prepared to put up with a bit of noise, let’s face it the work has to be done some time so yes there will be some inconvenience.   We return again on the 9th November 2017 and will be staying as normal for 15 nights. As platinum members all I ask is that management and staff continue to make this a memorable holiday especially as we will be celebrating my husbands birthday.  We have booked a junior suit ocean view  which we always do, it would be great to be upgraded this time so we do not hear the noise from our…

title: Nice place to stay in pattaya..
review: Dear Linda,  It is our great pleasure that you and your husband have stayed at Amari Pattaya on a number of occasions and have always had a great time with us. I am delighted that our staff has always been able to deliver a high level of service to exceed your expectations.  We look forward to your return to “your home” at Amari Pattaya in November for a special birthday celebration of your husband. We will do our utmost to make your stay even more wonderful and memorable one.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Under construction
review: Nice place to stay in pattaya.. Service is excellent and have a good view from room also a nice restaurant.. Have a best Breakfast ever.. Nice pool where you can enjoy with your friends and family.. Staff is also cooperate with us with quality service..👍🏻

title: EVER ENCHANTING AND CHARISMATIC AMARI OCEAN...PATTAYA
review: Dear krunal2017,  We are very glad to read of your wonderful experience, and that you enjoyed the hospitality of our staff. We are very proud of them.  We look forward to your return to “your” Amari Pattaya in the near future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Good stay for family
review: Bad is construction I suffer from noise and exhaust during swimimg in the pool Construction is so big  Good is quite location for sleep and family stay  Breakfast very good! not variety but deliciuos I wish eat again

title: Nice hotel, but can do better
review: Wouldn't class it as a 5 star hotel and the Garden wing rooms are a little dated. If you want better rooms make sure you book into the Ocean tower wing. Good staff service is a bit of a lottery. Depending on who you get, it can be great service or poor service. Some of the staff seem very disinterested in their job and it is reflected in house keeping and the front desk especially. The hotel's location is far enough away from walking street and the noise. There is a small beach (use this word loosely) opposite. The tavern bar and restaurant offers some good food and does special foody nights during the week.

title: Management Apathy
review: I have stayed at this hotel on and off since 2007. I was aware of the on going construction, and whilst it was noisy from 8 am at the pool it was something I realised I had to put up with.The staff at the hotel ( with one exception) are superb. Extremely friendly and in the main good at their job. They welcome you back as a returning customer with true warmth.  I did notice that breakfast was not as good as it used to be, but it was still good. There have been a few unnecessary cutbacks in my opinion.The pool area was very very quiet throughout my 10 day stay with there mainly being a group of about 8 Brits each day and occasionally t a few guests from other countries.  On my last but one day , I requested as an onyx gold a late check out ( apparently guaranteed upto 4pm). This…

title: Not good when renovation
review: Dear Mr. Thomas,  First of all, thank you very much for taking the time to share with us your comments. We obviously sincerely apologise for your disappointing experience with our receptionists by not properly handling the problem. Rest assured we will address this issue with our Front Office Manager who will re-train our team members on proper standards to prevent a re-occurrence. Our service focus is that we not only need to meet each and every guest's expectations, but is geared to trying our best to always exceed these. Unfortunately during your stay we have failed to achieve this objective.  Mr. Thomas, I do hope that you will give us another chance and consider staying in our hotel again should you return to Pattaya. If this is possible, I would be delighted to make all the necessary arrangements to ensure that you will have a relaxing stay as should be expected from Amari Hotels.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Beautiful Thailand, Great AMARI
review: Should be renovate parts by parts. We can see partition everywhere, and even no facilities for kids, we don’t want to swim inside a construction site. Don’t expect a high value of welcome, the temp lobby is extremely small.

title: Very good !
review: Must start with the staff, absolutely wonderful - bell boys, reception, drivers, security guards, waiters, pool bar staff, etc. Couldn't ask for a better staff.   Rooms: we were lucky to receive an upgrade to a 2 story room up on the 20th (last) floor, so we were very (!) happy with the room. Spacious, clean, really good.   Pool: great great great, also has a bar in the middle of the pool with happy hour daily 15:00 - 17:00. Plenty of fresh towels and space for all to sit and relax.   Mosquitos: 6 nights and not even one!  Location: there are better locations... Amari is at the northern end of the beach strip (at the "beginning"). But transportation is easy with local pickup taxi's that go in circles and it is only 10 baht per person.  For other attractions hotel has great taxi…

title: Beautiful hotel with great customer service
review: Dear Uri,  Thanks for taking the time to post your positive feedback on your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya. I was pleased to read that overall you had an enjoyable stay and found the food offering was great. Even more your compliments on our team’s friendliness and service ability are a great encouragement to them.  We really appreciate you recommending us to Trip Advisor community and look forward to your return to “your” Amari Pattaya in the near future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Great hotel with good ambience
review: Amari hotel can offer its visitors two big outdoor swimming pools, beautifully designed rooms and delicious buffet breakfasts that are worth its price. The hotel offers good room service with staff who does their job very responsibly. There are different kinds of rooms, both for a single stay, where you could stay in a very comfortable suit with an amazing view on Pattaya city and the sea, as well as for a family visit as it can offer you bigger rooms with equally beautiful view. This place might also be great for a family vacation, since it has a very nice kid playroom where you can safely leave your children with qualified instructors. The hotel is located at the downtown area, so it takes only about 5-10 minutes, depending on the traffic, to get to Central Festival shopping…

title: Good Property , Nice Location.... perfect for family vacations.
review: A very good hotel  with amazing view of pataya city as well as sea , although there is renovation going on in hotel , but that doesn't affect you at all,the hotel has shifted its lobby on 4th floor , we were 9 people with different requirements, the check in  process was quick and the staff was very helpful , there are people who have written negative reviews regarding disturbance due to construction, believe there no such noise or any disturbance whatsoever .its a 5 star property and has maintained the status .a highly recommended hotel in Pattaya

title: Amari tower pattaya best place to stay
review: Hello , visited Pattaya with friends... stayed at Amari Ocean.  This property is ideally located at Beach road, next to all popular cafes , restaurants, facing famous beach road.... walking distance to Mall & very convenient for public transport ( Took took )  Hotel is undergoing renovation, so you will find construction  activity near by....   Staff is very polite and courteous,..... special mentioning of security staff , they are very very soft spoken and ever smiling.  Really admire it.  Pool at hotel is very relaxing with Pool Bar a must try...  Hotel has excellent infrastructure.  Highly recommended for Family travel and somebody who is looking for luxury vacation at value for money....

title: MEDIOCRE STAY IN AMARI OCEAN PATTAYA
review: No tea/ coffee maker.... rooms are not consistent in size decor and furnishings even in same category of rooms.....all other things were fine and the view of room was very good. services were very prompt... cleanliness was very average.. and basic.....

title: Best for vacation
review: Dear Anoops37,  Thank you very much for your review. I am sorry to learn that there was an issue with the room cleanliness, and that you felt overall stay was good average. Rest assured we will address these issues with the concerned department heads for our team’s future improvements.  We really appreciate the information you have provided and do hope that you will reconsider staying with us again in the near future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Good hotel
review: Loved this place, staff is amazing. I was upgraded immediately I checked into the hotel. you have pretty good options for India and vegetarian food. Room service is amazing. If you opt for executive rooms and then access to executive lounge is very good concept. You get exclusive access to beverages and snacks as a part of package. In happy hours you can have pretty good drinks at free of cost. Very close to beach and city center mall. View from room is amazing.

title: Average experience.
review: your hotel have good location and I have been there 4 time during my holidays. This time your hotel was under remodeling so was not good as before. I hope that you will finish construction soon and new facility improve staying

title: accomodation
review: Dear  jacek799,  Thank you for your kind feedback. It’s gratifying to know that you have stayed with us on a number of occasions and have always enjoyed our service and facilities.   However, we do sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused by the renovation works during this stay. We hope that we will have another opportunity to welcome you back in our property in not so distant future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Stay in Pattaya for families and children
review: Hotel is decent and safe for families and children there staff is so cooperative and suggest best place to visit in Pattaya Indian food is also available in hotel swimming pool is clean They also give welcome drinks when we inter hotel

title: Forget it, unbearably noisy
review: I stayed here a few years ago for 20 days, they were building a huge tower on the south side and the rooms were unusable for rest during daylight hours into the evening. Now back, that building is done, but this time the Amari itself is building a damn tower on the North side right next to it! The second pool is gone, but they have not dropped the room rates. On top of that the electricity will be off from 9am to 5pm today. WTF?  The staff is oblivious to what makes for a competently valuable stay. They are charging premium rates for a subpar experience. The beds, tub and other room amenities are excellent, but if you have 110 decibels of building machinery echoing throughout the room then the point is moot.   If you're going to charge "western" rates then you should provide…

title: excellent hotel to stay with awesome service
review: Dear DirkMagurk,  First of all, thank you very much for taking the time to share with us your comments. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the negative experience you have encountered regarding the electricity cut off which has affected the power supply for a certain period of time. However we did our utmost to ensure and prepare power back up for our guests use.  We do once again sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused by this issue and also by the renovation works. We appreciate the information you have provided and do hope that you will reconsider staying with us again. We will do our utmost to make your stay more memorable than your recent visit.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Pattaya Review
review: we had a very very good experience at the hotel the rooms are good service is excellent .... the hotel staff was co operative and help full in giving early check in .... the food was awesome and had a lot of variety ... first hotel on the beach road .... main city area at walking distance .... had a awesome stay....next time will stay only at Amari .....

title: EXCELLENT ROOM
review: Dear inder77bat,  It was wonderful to be able to read your positive feedback on your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya. I am delighted to know you found our staff was doing their utmost to respond to your needs and fulfilled your expectations in a friendly manner. Thank you for recommending us to the Tripadvisor community.  We look forward to your return to Pattaya and would love to welcome you back to your Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: HOTEL IN RENOVATION / NOISE
review: I was not expected that, hotel is a good standart but under renovation. I would not advice to go there for the next few months.  My first room was front of a construction site (Noise from crane, machines, trucks...), I ask to change the room which I got it and I appreciate. Also starting 9 in the morning, some noise from  screwdriver for the renovation of rooms. At the swimming pool (Nice place) but just beside the construction site (Too much noise) and difficult to relax.  The full hotel is under renovation and the day when I book the hotel, I did not get any information about that.  Make sure before booking that renovation is over, otherwise without that this is a nice hotel.  Regards,  Hervé

title: Surrounding by Under construction area (renovation)
review: Dear Hervé,  We do sincerely apologised for the negative experience you had encountered during your stay with us due to renovation and landscaping programme and the lack of information. However, I was glad that our team members were able to manage and resolve this issue immediately.   We do hope that you will give us another chance and consider staying in our hotel again should you return to Pattaya. If this is possible, I would be delighted to make all the necessary arrangements to ensure that you will have a relaxing stay as should be expected from Amari Hotels.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: ห้องวิวสวยมากจากห้องมุมซีวิว
review: Very nice hotel, but under renovation. Surrounding by Under construction area. Beach at the front are closed. Little far to the night street by walk.  Bathtub inside the room located in the open area, difficult to use when travelling with friends or family.

title: Excellent comfortable stay
review: Dear Godcha,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay. We are sorry to read that your experience did not live up to your expectations. We do sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused by the renovation works. Please rest assured that every effort were made to ensure minimal disturbance to guest comfort and enjoyment.   Should you decide to return to our hotel, please do not hesitate to contact me directly as I will be delighted to ensure that all comforts are granted to you and that you have a trouble-free and relaxing break.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: stay at amari ocean tower
review: great sea view for type Junior suite ocean view. good for relax and don't have to go out. near beach. not far from Tiffany and Central festival. feel safe and comfortable. I will be back for sure. xox

title: Great stay,but sad staff are getting paid off
review: Fourth time here,decided to upgrade to Executive room,which gives free canapés and food in the early evening,and it was so worth it.The food and staff were exemplary,and would recommend it to everyone,a special mention to all the staff,especially Cap and Lila I think her name was,they were awesome,so attentive and charming,the pool staff and swim up bar staff were first class, unfortunately the cocktail lady was getting paid off due to there being less guests with the refurbishment,after18 years,felt terrible,she's like a friend after this time,making great cocktails

title: A lot of noise from work
review: A lot of noise from work it 's impossible to sleep in the morning This completely ruins the stay; We came this winter and it was very good. I doubt coming back next winter.However the staff is always friendly and attentive

title: So Sad
review: Dear Mr. Cyril,  First of all, thank you very much for taking the time to share with us your comments. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the negative experience you have encountered regarding the hotel renovation.  I am delighted however that you were impressed with our service provided. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit to Pattaya. Please rest assured that we will do utmost to make your stay even more memorable than your first visit.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Always a sure value
review: I had to write this review I read with sadness that the garden wing has been pulled down. I  just wanted to say I went and stayed in the garden wing 4 times and I loved it felt like I was allways at home.  Wonderful  staff lovely room and the breakfast was outstanding.  Thank you so much Amari  for giving me so many wonderfull memories. Hopefully I will comeback when the devolopment has finished.

title: Hoping new Amari Garden Wing...
review: We always book the horizon rooms and have never been disappointed by either the rooms or the service. Horizon food during happy hour is of high standard. Service in the horizon is also of the same high standard. Thank you Mrs Jeerapa for your service beyond the call of duty. That also goes for the other staff members at the horizon. Thank you also for our upgrade.  The works in progress did not bother us on the high floor.

title: Excellent beachview room, with caveats
review: The Amari Ocean Pattaya is really nicely situated near the top corner of the Pattaya beach, which means that it is in a quieter spot, but is still accessible to both the main beach road, as well as the North Pattaya area.   I really enjoyed our room, which had an amazing view of the beach and of Pattaya itself - basically the whole wall was a window! This along with a large bathtub makes it a great place for a couple's retreat.  The restaurant downstairs is also surprisingly good. But there are caveats as well to all these great comments: - as many have said, the hotel is undergoing renovations, so constructions could get in the way. Luckily our room was far so we didn't hear the noise. But navigating around the hotel is slightly tricky. - my bigger issue is with guests who were…

title: The place is going through a major revamps the noise is unbearable service is slow never stay at this hotel again
review: Dear Werckmeister,  It is wonderful to receive your positive feedback and we thank you for taking the time to share us with your detailed review. I was pleased to read that you were thoroughly impressed with your room and its view.   However, we do apologise for the cigarettes smell from other room which our team has taken immediate action in trying to resolve the issue. Please accept my sincere apologies for any inconvenience caused.  We really appreciate the information you have provided and do hope that we will have another opportunity to welcome you back in our property in not so distant future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Really really good
review: Don't stay here...the hotel is going through a major revamp and it will be years before completed. Save your money and go to another hotel. Service is slow and there are construction workers who peer over the fence and perv on all the women in the pool.  Never again would I stay here...

title: pleasant stay
review: Dear Mr. Grant,  First of all, thank you very much for taking the time to share with us your comments. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the negative experience you have encountered regarding the hotel renovation. Please rest assured that we all take this very seriously and I have already spoken with the respective department heads to avoid any re-occurrence whatsoever in the future.  We do hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit to Pattaya and would be delighted if you would allow us to show you the level of service usually upheld at our Amari Pattaya. We will do our utmost to make your stay more memorable than your recent visit.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Pattaya Business Trip
review: Overall trip was incredible. Way too much value for money. In Pattaya we got a upgrade to duplex for free. Doesn't always happen. Family was impressed too. No other changes, its all perfect. In all completely impressed.

title: Amazing views, friendly staff and an awesome holiday hotel
review: I have no words to descirbe the service received at the Amari. They were just amazing.  If I had to rate the hotels I have been to in the past year or so they were one of the best in terms of service.  They had all the amenities considering its a 4 star hotel. The location is also good - a short walk away from pubs and other happening areas around Pattaya.  They have a SPA which I would surely recommend.  Also drinks by the pool was good.  If I ever visit Thailand or Pattaya, I think I will be loyal to the Amari brand just for their service to their customers.

title: Great room and staff. Breakfast can be improved.
review: It was my second stay here. Room was clean and comfort. Nice staffs with great service mind. Breakfast quality was dropped from last year for example, less variety of juice, cheese, sausage, fruit etc. Long waiting line on eggs and noodle station.

title: Very shabby rooms & most unhelpful Concierge
review: My wife & I found ourselves in a very shabby, run down & unwelcoming room. It was a far cry from the pictures on the hotel website & the reception staff though helpful actually asked me to show him the image on the website! Its hard to imagine that the hotel staff is unaware of the images posted on the website. Of course, after seeing the picture he offered to change our room & even upgrade us but the rooms just didn't make the cut.  We were booked for 2 nights but checked out after sending a night. Since we had to move our luggage my wife requested the concierge/ bell desk to call for a taxi & he refused saying that we could either use the hotel car (at a huge premium obviously) else hail a cab from the main road! To worsen matters he told her he would call a cab but the charge…

title: Amazing place to stay
review: Dear yotravel,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your detailed review. We are sorry to read that your experience did not live up to your expectations in all aspects of your stay with us.   We appreciate the information we have received from you and sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by our Concierge. Rest assured we will discuss this issue with Front Office Manager to take immediate actions to prevent any re-occurrence and ensure that proper service is rectified.  We do hope that you will give us another chance to show you that the service you have experienced during your stay is not the reflection of the quality we pride ourselves here at Amari Pattaya. Should you decide to return to our hotel, please do not hesitate to contact me directly as I will be delighted to ensure that all comforts are granted to you and that you have a trouble-free and relaxing break.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Beach holidays
review: Myself and my friend stayed in here for a week hotel is stunning beautiful and spotless lots of space, we had room 1059 on the 15th floor room very large bed was so comfortable bathroom had a huge bath great shower and his and her sinks. Breakfast has a great choice always plenty to eat and pick from. Pool area is lovely and clean sun beds are comfortbale and pool bar is lovely what made our time at this hotel was aundorson "june" as he got called the pool bar man he was a gentlman so chatty and lovely couldnt look after us any better he is truly one amazing man and great at his job all staff at hotel would do anything to help you and were all very kind and lovely i would love to visit this hotel ps the massage you get as a compliment is amazing 30 min back neck and shoulders…

title: Welcome to the construction site
review: Arriving from a long trip a long queue at checkin counter. It felt like each guest took 5min to register so the whole process took me around 20min. The hotel lobby too dark.  The room itself modern and stylish. Large room with a bathtub and a wall separating the washing table from the sleeping area. Separate showers and toilet with door and a small balcony appreciated by the smokers. Nice working table and the room with plenty of light. WLAN free and good signal through the hotel. Aircon a little difficult to control the temp. Either too cold or too hot.  If there would just not have been the construction site. Building of the new hotel wing generating noise from ramming machines not from early in the morning but constant.  Gym rather small with 3 running machines so at times…

title: A great place for an awesome holiday
review: Dear bizonroute,  I appreciate the kind feedback you have provided and thank you for staying with us at Amari Pattaya. We do sincerely apologised for any inconvenience you had during your stay with us due to renovation and landscaping programme of our Garden Wing building.   Your comments are important and have been noted, allowing us to take action and make improvements. We appreciate the information we received from you and apologise for any inconveniences caused.  I am delighted however that our service provided during your stay has met your expectations. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit to Pattaya. Please rest assured that we will do utmost to make your stay even more memorable than your recent visit.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Business trip
review: Great value place in Pattaya. There are many facilities with decent quality in both a hotel room and the incredible swimming pool. I had a very great time in the room with a wonderful bathtub behind the king-sized bed. The service quality is excellent. Strongly recommended.

title: GOOD TIME IN AMARI
review: Dear kawinj2017,  It is very encouraging to read your positive feedback and to learn that you enjoyed your stay at our Amari Pattaya. Thank you for you compliments to our team members. We really appreciate you recommending us to Trip Advisor community.  We look forward to welcoming you back to your home at Amari Pattaya in the near future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Very good hotel with wonderful location. the staff cheats us. be careful
review: This hotel had a great location and the customer service was exceptional.  I arrived after a 2 very long flights and was able to book a massage right away in the Breezes Spa.  All the staff was friendly and the view from my ocean front room was amazing.

title: 'Living on past Glory'
review: I had the occasion last week to visit Pattaya for a business conference. The Amari Garden is gone with its resort style charm to be replaced by........ Checked into Amari  Ocean. The friendliness and welcoming nature which one associated with the earlier avatar is totally gone. The reception desk is downright rude as if they are doing you a favour letting you in to the hotel. And can you best this: there were numerous people waiting in the lounge to be allotted rooms , for some reason even though most of their guests check out at around 10 they still will not checkin before 2 pm. The icing on the cake is that there were staff going all around the lobby remonstrating all the weary travellers to sit properly and straight in the seats lest the decorum of the property is disturbed.…

title: Good place
review: Dear GandhiJ,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us the constructive feedback on your recent stay. We do sincerely apologise for the fact that your arrival experience did not live up to your expectation. We have discussed your concerns with our Front Office Manager who will re-train our staff our standards to prevent re-occurrence. Our service focus is that we not only need to meet each and every guest's expectations, but should try our utmost to always exceed these.  Due to the peak period and high occupancy, our hotel and restaurants may be crowded at certain periods of time. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.  In regards to your comments about room maintenance and cleanliness. Rest assured we will address these issues with the concerned department heads for our team’s future improvements.   We really appreciate the information you have provided and do hope that you will reconsider staying with us and allow us to show you the level of service we usually uphold in Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Nice hotel, nice location
review: Nice place with good food and nice position in quiet position in Pátrala. Nice seeview from the room. Personál dess percent. Transport with tuktuk wery fast to the walking street. I can recomend for the visit.

title: Superb Short break hear
review: My first time here at Pattaya was nice. The hotel location is near every place. not close to the beach but just cross the road. In front of the hotel, there are taxi, public transportation where you can take it to the walking street. Nearby the hotel has convenient store. Not far from Central shopping mall. Same area with Holiday Inn, Mercure, Ibis. The room is clean enough, the pool is big and clean. The staff is superb friendly. So, i really enjoyed stay here and will be one of my choice for next visit.

title: mrs
review: Amari Ocean became my another favorite hotel. It was great stayed as first time in Executive room on 18th floor which is comfy bed and i can see the sky line and beautiful sunset from my bed. The Holizon club lounge service is Excellent ; evening cocktail and canape' during 17.30-19.30hrs. Special thank you to Ms.Muoy ,Ms.laila and Ms.Ning for took a care of me and my friend so well even just only a night there but i can feel how big professional they are ^^ Appreciated  Yes , the Hotel under the construction but for me really not a problem all facilities still  available with friendly staff. i will definitely go back to Amari Ocean Pattaya again soon.

title: Overall excellent
review: Nice experience for the first time in Amari ocean. Earlier was Amari garden which was also excellent. Have already submitted my reviews in survey which i believe will be addressed. Looking forward to take your services again.

title: Not a good hotel except for the view from my room (ocean facing room)
review: The hotel room was quite old. Bed sheet was dirty. This hotel really need some refurbishment. Gym room was super small. Breakfast was not good (not enough variety and there were flies on breads). Swimming pool was not clean as well. Hotel was located at the another side of walking street in pattaya. We need to take local bus/taxi to shopping malls and walking street (not so bad but people who aim for convenience should not choose this hotel). The only good thing was the view from my room (I chose the one with ocean facing, woke up with ocean view every day). As a 5-star hotel (per travel agent), the  overall experience was not good.

title: 18th floor and Holizon club
review: Dear chichungw2017,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share with us your comments. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the negative experience you have encountered during your recent stay with us.  I am sorry to read that your experience did not live up to your expectations in all aspects of your stay with us. I have shared your comments regarding the housekeeping service and breakfast to our department heads for improvements. I do once again apologise for any inconvenience caused.   I am delighted however that you enjoyed the view from your room and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit to Pattaya. Please rest assured that we will do utmost to make your stay even more memorable than your first visit.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: EXCELLENT STAY
review: Holizon club service is very goods. Dinner cocktail with drink is very nice. Hotel officer has hospitality. Club is private zone. Internet access is so easy to remember. Laundry service is good, my shirt has a nice perfume.

title: OUR FAMILY HOLIDAY 🏝🌊
review: Dear Sumate,  It is very encouraging to read your positive feedback and to learn that you enjoyed your stay at our Amari Pattaya. Thank you for you compliments to our team members and especially at Executive Club lounge. We really appreciate you recommending us to Trip Advisor community.  We look forward to become your favourite choice of hotel when visiting Pattaya again next time.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Junior Suite with Family
review: Got an upgrade from Deluxe to be Junior Suite that have wonderful view. But there is noisy due to construction. Some facilities has gone with the renovation of Amari Garden, it make us a little bit disappoint.

title: Holiday
review: The exclusiv room very good.The hotel direct to the beach road. The service perfekt.Room,service and the pool for me very good. Many taxi go for 10 Baht around the beach and the second road.On the end start the walking-street

title: Best hotel to stay at!
review: Dear Manfred,  Thank you very much for your positive feedback. I am delighted to know that you enjoyed our hotel facilities and our location.   We look forward to become your favourite choice of hotel when visiting Pattaya again next time.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Great view
review: It was the best hotel of our tour! Located right at the beach road. My room was at 14th floor, with the full end view of beach as well as city. There services were too good and staff was too humble and sweet. Food was no doubt tasty.

title: Excellent Hotel, away from the "party" noise, but close enough if you need it
review: Very pleasant and helpful staff. Stayed for 5 days. View from 10th floor amazing looking over Pattaya harbour with no stop boat action to watch. Highly recommend.Pool area is very clean and the kids will love watching the small like squirrels that run across the branches. Grab a cocktail at the pool bar and treat kids to a ice cream.

title: Well positioned hotel, lovely rooms
review: We stayed here over the UK Easter holidays for 9 nights. We were a family of 2 adults with 2 adult children in tow plus a significant other. Fabulous foyer and friendly staff. We were allocated our rooms and were surprised at the size. The beds are 7ft by 7ft and very very comfortable. View were side on and you could see the sea from most rooms I suspect. The only downside for us was that although there was a wooden blind shielding the bathroom from the bedroom if you're using the toilet facilities you do feel a bit vulnerable (there's also no locks on the shower or toilet door and the toilet door has obscured glass). Pool is lovely and there were activities to do, heat permitting! One criticism which I relayed on this site when we were at the Amari in Hua Hin last year was that…

title: Mr Cheung
review: Upgraded room with full sea-view good, food and beverage good, gym room facilities good staff nice but some of the swimming pool was closed due to the hotel under renovation hope can be resume all the pool for our next visit.

title: Superb Hotel with Superb Location, Facilities, Hospitality...
review: Dear cwshun,  We appreciate your kind feedback regarding your recent stay at Amari Pattaya and it is very encouraging to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us.   We look forward to welcoming you back to our new Amari Pattaya on your next visit.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Perfect Stay
review: The Location ========== THE BEAUTIFUL AND CONVENIENT LOCATION... You are in the centre of almost everything you need... Located on the Beach Road itself and very close to the Dolphin Round About, which ensures that you are close to everything you need... talk of super markets, restaurants (being an Indian - I was happy to have Indian Restaurant close by). Al Cazer / Tiffany show are very much at a Walking Distance. If one wish to explore Walking Street and other night life the same is easily accessible with Tuk-Tuks by paying just 10 Bahts.  The Hotel Property ================== Basically the Hotel Property has two Wings... Both are connected but the one with the entrance close to Doplin Round About is under renovation and surprisingly it never created any troubles during our…

title: Not impressed
review: Lovely Hotel on the Beach Road very close to the Dolphin Circle.10 Baht ride to walking street for those interested.Couple of Family Mart stores just 5 minute walk from the hotel.Plenty of Restaurants around.No inconvenience or noise at all from the ongoing renovation .Reached the hotel at 9 A.M with 2 children and were extended early check in.Much appreciated.The room was very spacious with a nice bath tub.The pool was wonderful and the Kids loved it .Ordered Lunch twice which was delicious.Will stay again on our next visit

title: Holiday
review: Very happy with the choice, had a great stay at this Hotel, Great location and great service. Would recommend to anyone. Good transport service to airport. Close to all the shops and restaurants and nightlife.

title: Nice location almost all room is sea face
review: Dear John,  Thank you very much for your positive review. I am happy to learn that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay at Amari Pattaya and found the hotel a great choice. We highly appreciate you recommending our hotel to the TripAdvisor community. We look forward to welcoming you back whenever you decide to visit Pattaya again in the near future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Amari Pataya
review: We had done business conference in same hotel we had group of 80 people, very good professional management in hotel, beach area and all types of show done nr by hotel , we stay there for 3 nights, best property in Pattaya

title: Good Stay
review: Dear vibhorparikh,  It is very encouraging to read your positive feedback and to learn that you enjoyed your stay at our Amari Pattaya during business conference. Thank you for your compliments. We really appreciate you recommending us to Trip Advisor community.  We look forward to welcoming you again on a future occasion.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Note here in construction
review: Even while been under renovation, there was no noise during afternoon and night. Horizon club was really good and the breakfast was very nice. The room was clean and with all I expected. Very good stay.

title: Beautiful location
review: Hello guys this is one of the best hotels of pattaya.Beautiful rooms,walking distance in fact just in front of ocean its location is beautiful.Staff if superb and caring too.Buffet spread is amazi ng.We loved this hotel

title: Good, receptive & best located
review: Dear Sanadimple,  It was great to read your positive feedback of your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya and to learn that you had a wonderful stay. Thank you for your kind comments regarding our team members. I am delighted that our service provided during your stay has exceeded your expectations.  We look forward to your return to Pattaya and would love to welcome you back to your Amari Pattaya.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Amari Ocean -Good Location!
review: I stayed at hotel Amari Ocean in May 17. I was overwhelmed by the courtesy of supervisor in terms of explaining the room location having sea view. Also about amenities available at the hotel for guests. This hotel has one of the best breakfast buffet for guests amongst pattaya hotels. Expect good Indian food here. The location is bang on beach road. Room sizes are comparable with the best in class & so is cleanness & toiletries, linens etc. This was my second stay at Amari Ocean & will continue staying here whenever in Pattaya till any major goof up happen 😀recommending to all friends

title: Its a great time at amari ocean  pattaya located in heart of city convenient for shopping and site seen neet and clean r
review: Dear Janardan P,  Thanks for taking the time to post your positive feedback on your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya. I was pleased to read that you enjoyed all aspects of your stay with us and found the breakfast offering was great. Even more your compliments on our team’s friendliness and service ability are a great encouragement to them.  We look forward to become your favourite choice of hotel when visiting Pattaya again next time.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Relaxing
review: Great Location. Its near to beach. Rooms are big and clean. Hotel staff is cooperative. Swimming Pool was clean and big. It has limited option for vegetarian menu in breakfast.  Over all comfortable stay. Good Stay!

title: Amari Adventure
review: It was an awesome experience. Picturesque property with mouth watering food. Perfect place to relax. Swimming pool is just fantastic. Location is absolutely bang on, would love to visit again . Excellent staff and service. Top of the line. Keep up the good work guys.

title: Good property
review: Dear Ankit,  It was wonderful to be able to read your positive feedback on your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya. I was pleased to read that overall you had an enjoyable stay and found the location was great. Even more your compliments on our team’s friendliness and service ability are a great encouragement to them.   We look forward to become your favourite choice of hotel when visiting Pattaya again next time.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Good hotel and excellent hospitality
review: We went phuket and then to pattaya with my family. Thanks to the upgradation to family room with bunker beds for my kids. Swimming pool and spa is good.  Spa people are kind and professional. Location of the hotel is good with sea facing. But to our bad luck there was some construction activity going on in the sea shore. So we couldn't get a clear view. I will recommend to my friends and family members

title: Great Stay
review: Dear vijay151075,  It was wonderful to be able to read your positive feedback on your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya. I am happy you enjoyed your stay and liked your Family room. We highly appreciate you recommending us to your friends and family and look forward to your return for your next stay with us.   With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Value for money
review: Hotel is at Beach road, very convenient for the beach, staff is helpful and room service is excellent, but in breakfast more Indian vegetarian items required as I have seen that lot of Indians were stayed there

title: No doubt, a really place of smile.!!
review: I've stayed here for 4 days and it was very relaxing place to stay with.. first the guy from the reception who was really accommodating and will gave you quality service upon checking in that was indeed a thumbs up, the guard at the entrance whenever you enter he will always give you a nice gesture of greeting. The two staff at the pool bar you guys were amazing it was a pleasure to have known a great staff like both of them. Come my way to main restaurant to have a drink its a bit quiet night actually thanks to one of your staff (forgot the name) he serve a drink and upon asking him if he can booked a massage for me and no doubt he said yes and started to call and done i was booked already thank you so much.. and lastly the massage was a wow..!! Great job.

title: Good service and good breakfast.
review: Dear Red C,  It is very encouraging to read your positive feedback and to learn that you enjoyed your stay at our Amari Pattaya. Thank you for you compliments to our team members at reception, pool bar and restaurant.  I am delighted that our service provided during your stay has exceeded your expectations.  We look forward to become your favourite choice of hotel when visiting Pattaya again next time.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Summer trip 2017
review: I love this hotel breakfast. Variety food and delicious. Very surprised that chicken rice is very simple manu but very delicious. Fresh coffee. I like bakery station.  My daughter really enjoy with hotel pool. All staffs have very good service mind. Just pillow that I think it too soft for me.  The hotel not easy to go to the beach because now footpath is under construction.

title: Pattaya experience
review: Dear Khun Daowadee,  It was wonderful to read your positive feedback on your recent stay at our Amari Pattaya. I was pleased to read that you found our breakfast buffet great. Even more your compliments on our team’s friendliness and service ability are a great encouragement to them.  We look forward to welcoming you and your family back whenever you decide to visit Pattaya again in the near future.  With kind regards,  Robert Rijnders Senior Vice-President & Area General Manager, Pattaya

title: Don't forget things in the room
review: We glad to select this junior suite ocean view type as it has excellent ocean view. Although it's a bit high cost but we are willing to pay for it. Finally we hope to come back and stay here again next trip.

title: Construction Site
review: Stayed here 3 nights May 2017.  Be warned this is a construction site, they are demolishing the Garden Rooms.   The hotel is extremely quiet with very few guests.  We were told the construction work is being over the next 2 years.  The main pool is closing down shortly.  It's normally a fantastic hotel.... sadly I won't be coming back.

title: 2 Day Holiday in Pattaya
review: Dear Gartree,  We do sincerely apologised for the negative experience you had encountered during your stay with us due to renovation and landscaping programme of our Garden Wing building. However, every effort were made to ensure minimal disturbance to guest comfort and enjoyment. Our free form pool in the garden is still operating as usual.  We do once again apologise for this disappointing experience. We do hope that you will give us another chance and consider staying in our hotel again should you return to Pattaya. If this is possible, I would be delighted to make all the necessary arrangements to ensure that you will have a relaxing stay as should be expected from Amari Hotels.
